original: The Alexiad
translation: 阿莱克修斯传

original: After a series of devastating losses to invading Turkish forces, the Byzantine Empire is reeling. But there is hope - the great general Alexios Komnenos has just seized the throne from the corrupt Nikephoros III. Alexios - whose life was documented by his daughter Anna in 'the Alexiad' - and his successors would halt the decline of the Empire and push back the Turkish invaders from western Anatolia, buying more time for the ailing remnants of the old Roman Empire. For now, Anatolia is ruled by Suleyman I, a member of the Seljuk dynasty, who arrogantly calls his new state the 'Sultanate of Rum' (Rome).
translation: 在突厥入侵者造成了一系列毁坏性的损失之后，拜占庭帝国摇摇欲坠。然而希望之火并未熄灭——伟大的阿莱克修斯·科穆宁将军刚刚取代了堕落的尼基弗鲁斯三世，加冕为帝。阿莱克修斯——他传奇的一生被他的女儿安娜载入《阿莱克修斯传》史册——和他的继承者们挽狂澜于既倒，将突厥侵略者从安纳托利亚西部驱逐了出去，为衰败、残破的古老罗马帝国赢得了更久的存续。回到一切的开始，眼下，安纳托利亚由塞尔柱家族的苏莱曼一世统治。他傲慢地宣称他的王国为罗姆（罗马）苏丹国。

original: The Latin Empire
translation: 拉丁帝国

original: The notorious and ill fated Fourth Crusade, which was supposed to retake Jerusalem after an invasion through Egypt, was instead derailed by scheming Venetians, corrupt leaders and the deposed Byzantine Emperor Alexios IV, seeking to regain his lost throne. The result was the tragic sack of Constantinople and the subsequent establishment of the so called Latin Empire. Almost none of the Crusaders even reached the Holy Land. Meanwhile, the infamous King John, brother of Richard the Lionheart, rules in England, and the Christian states of Spain face off against the powerful Almohad dynasty.
translation: 臭名昭著，受人诅咒的第四次十字军东征，原计划在入侵埃及后收复圣城耶路撒冷，却在狡诈的威尼斯人、堕落的十字军领袖和妄图夺回皇位的拜占廷皇帝阿莱克修斯四世的诱导下偏离了正轨。结果导致君士坦丁堡惨遭洗劫，以及在废墟上建立起所谓的拉丁帝国。几乎连一名十字军战士都未曾踏上圣地。在这期间，狮心王理查的弟弟，臭名昭著的约翰统治着英格兰，而伊比利亚基督教诸国正面临强大的阿尔摩哈德王朝的威胁。

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] receives your ultimatum.
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]收到了你的最后通牒。

original:
I am afraid the Faction I represent must insist on succession by Seniority. We are fully prepared to take up arms should you refuse, and rest assured, we have enough men to enforce our just demand...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
恐怕我代表的派系必须坚持采用长者继承法。我们有充足的准备付诸于武力，如果你敢于拒绝的话，我们有足够的军力来达成我们的合理要求，这是毋庸置疑的……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] receives an ultimatum.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]收到了一个最后通牒。

original: Over my dead body!
translation: 除非从我的尸体上踏过去！

original:
I am afraid the Faction I represent must insist on succession by Primogeniture. We are fully prepared to take up arms should you refuse, and rest assured, we have enough men to enforce our just demand...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
恐怕我代表的派系必须坚持采用长子继承法。我们有充足的准备付诸于武力，如果你敢于拒绝的话，我们有足够的军力来达成我们的合理要求，这是毋庸置疑的……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
I am afraid the Faction I represent must insist on Elective Monarchy. We are fully prepared to take up arms should you refuse, and rest assured, we have enough men to enforce our just demand...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
恐怕我代表的派系必须坚持采用选举君主制。我们有充足的准备付诸于武力，如果你敢于拒绝的话，我们有足够的军力来达成我们的合理要求，这是毋庸置疑的……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
I am afraid the Faction I represent must insist on succession by Gavelkind. We are fully prepared to take up arms should you refuse, and rest assured, we have enough men to enforce our just demand...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
恐怕我代表的派系必须坚持采用均分继承法。我们有充足的准备付诸于武力，如果你敢于拒绝的话，我们有足够的军力来达成我们的合理要求，这是毋庸置疑的……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
For too long, the crown has restricted our historic rights and liberties. The time has come to lower the Crown Authority! Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences. Rest assure that I have gathered others who are equally upset...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
很长时间以来，王权限制了我们历史上享有的权利与自由。到了必须削弱王权的时刻！和平接受我们的要求或是让我们诉诸武力，你在里面选一个吧。毋庸置疑的是，我已经团结了其他对王权感到不满的人……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
It is time for you to recognize the full independence of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and the other states in the Independence Faction. Be reasonable and let us not resort to bloodshed.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你是时候该承认[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]和我们派系的其他成员应当享有完全的独立了。如果你足够理性的话，也许战争可以避免。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
[Root.GetFirstName], I name you a pretender! [From.SupportedClaimant.GetTitledName] is the true ruler of [From.SupportedClaimantTitle.GetName], as recognized by myself and other nobles. Relinquish the title or there will be war!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[Root.GetFirstName]，我要指控你这个篡权者！我和其他的贵族认识到，[From.SupportedClaimant.GetTitledName]才是[From.SupportedClaimantTitle.GetName]的真正持有者。你必须放弃这个窃得的头衔，否则我们将诉诸战争！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Your support of [Root.SupportedClaimant.GetTitledName] is shocking. However, in order to spare the realm from a harrowing civil war, I will resign in [Root.SupportedClaimant.GetPossPronoun] favor.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你对 [Root.SupportedClaimant.GetTitledName]的支持真是令人震惊。无论如何，为了使国家免遭内战的蹂躏，我将屈从于[Root.SupportedClaimant.GetPossPronoun]人情。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Your lack of faith in my duties as your liege saddens me, but I do recognize your desire to pursue your own destiny. However, do not expect my future protection, or, indeed, friendship.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你信仰的缺失让作为封君的我感到伤心，但是我认识到你渴望继续走你自己的路。既然如此，我对你的保护和友谊都将成为历史。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to change the succession law to Seniority. Your valuable support in this conflict will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免国家因内战而分裂，[From.GetTitledName]已经同意采用年长者继承。你在此次冲突中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

诚挚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

translation: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!已经同意了§Y长者继承派§!的要求。继承法改变了。

translation: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! 已经同意了§Y均分继承派§!的要求。继承法改变了。

[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:

真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: Under pressure from a powerful Faction, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has agreed to §YLower Crown Authority§!.
translation: 在一个强大派系的压力下，§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!已经同意§Y降低王权§!。

original:
In order to avoid a fruitless civil war, [From.GetTitledName] has wisely agreed to release us all from vassalage. Your valuable support in this matter will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免无价值的内战，[From.GetTitledName]已经明智地同意解除我们的封臣义务。你在此次冲突中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

S真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: Under pressure from the powerful Independence Faction, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to release the [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] and others from their vassalage.
translation: 在一个强大的独立派系压力下，[From.GetTitledName] 已经同意解除[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]和其他成员的附庸关系。

original:
Marvellous news! [From.GetTitledName] has wisely heeded our demand and accepted [FromFrom.SupportedClaimant.GetTitledName] as ruler of [FromFrom.SupportedClaimantTitle.GetName]. Let the celebration commence!

Signed,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
真不可思议！[From.GetTitledName]已经明智地同意你的要求并承认 [FromFrom.SupportedClaimant.GetTitledName]作为[FromFrom.SupportedClaimantTitle.GetName]的领主。开始庆祝吧！

此致，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经向派系屈服并且认同[FromFrom.SupportedClaimant.GetTitledName]作为[FromFrom.SupportedClaimantTitle.GetName]的统治者。

translation: 在[This.GetName]降低王权

original: Members seek to lower the Crown Authority in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 试图在[This.GetName]降低王权的成员。一旦实力足够强大，§Y[From.GetBestName]§!可能会向§Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒。

original: Independence
translation: 独立

original: Members seek complete independence. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!. The leader of the Independence faction is likelier to take greater risks than other faction leaders, and will have fewer qualms about striking when the liege is already under attack.
translation: 试图完全独立的成员。一旦实力足够强大，§Y[From.GetBestName]§!可能会向§Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒。独立派系的领袖比其他派系领袖更倾向于冒险一搏，在封君被攻击的时候更加倾向于无视良心的谴责发动叛乱。

original: Install Claimant
translation: 扶植宣称

original: [New.GetTitledFirstName] for [This.GetName]
translation: [New.GetTitledFirstName]宣称 [This.GetName]

original: Members seek to install §Y[New.GetTitledName]§! on the throne of [This.GetName]§!. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 试图扶植§Y[New.GetTitledName]§!登上[This.GetName]§!的宝座的成员。一旦实力足够强大，§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!可能会向§Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒。

original: Demand Succession by Seniority
translation: 要求年长者继承

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding succession by Seniority. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求采用年长者继承。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，你的派系会诉诸武力。

original: Demand Succession by Primogeniture
translation: 要求长子继承

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding succession by Primogeniture. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求采用长子继承。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，你的派系会诉诸武力。

original: Demand Elective Monarchy
translation: 要求选举君主制

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the institution of Elective Monarchy. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求采用选举君主制。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，你的派系会诉诸武力。

original: Demand Succession by Gavelkind
translation: 要求均分继承

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding succession by Gavelkind. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求采用均分继承。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，你的派系会诉诸武力。

original: Demand Lower Crown Authority
translation: 要求降低王权

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding lower Crown Authority. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求降低王权。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，你的派系会诉诸武力。

original: Demand Independence
translation: 要求独立

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding independence for you and the other members of the Independence Faction. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, the Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求你派系的所有成员获得独立地位。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，你的派系会诉诸武力。

original: Demand Installation of Claimant
translation: 要求兑现宣称

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the installation of §Y[Root.SupportedClaimant.GetBestName]§! on the throne of §Y[Root.SupportedClaimantTitle.GetName]§!. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, the Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求扶植§Y[Root.SupportedClaimant.GetBestName]§!登上§Y[Root.SupportedClaimantTitle.GetName]§!的宝座。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，你的派系会诉诸武力。

translation: 平坦地形专家

original: This character is an expert at leading troops on flat terrain.
translation: 此角色是一名在平坦地形上统率军队的专家。

original: Rough Terrain Expert
translation: 崎岖地形专家

original: This character is an expert at leading troops in rough terrain.

translation: 山地地形专家

original: This character is an expert at leading troops in deserts.

original: Holy Warrior
translation: 圣战士

original: This character fights best against heathens and infidels, but hesitates in battle against those of the same faith.
translation: 此角色在同野蛮人和异教徒作战时战斗力最强，但在同相同信仰的敌人作战时犹豫不决。

original: Unyielding
translation: 不屈

original: This character will stubbornly fight to his last breath, compelling his men to do the same while refusing to yield an inch.
translation: 此角色会顽强的战斗到最后一刻，并且强迫他的部下同他一起这样做，拒绝任何妥协。

original: Minimum Retinue for all landed characters: $MIN_RET$
translation: 所有有领地的贵族的最小近卫军：$MIN_RET$

original: Create a §Y$NAME$§! retinue, this will start out almost empty but reinforce up to the specified size.
translation: 建立一支§Y$NAME$§!近卫军，开始时几乎没有人力但会慢慢补充起来的。

original: Shock
translation: 冲击

original: Defence
translation: 防御

original: Cavalry
translation: 骑兵

original: Skirmish
translation: 散兵

original: Levy Upkeep
translation: 征召兵维护费

original: Retinue Upkeep
translation: 近卫军维护费

translation: $VASSAL$领主征召兵

original: §Y$VASSAL$§! could provide at most §Y$NUM$§! $TYPE$\n
translation: §Y$VASSAL$§!能够提供最多 §Y$NUM$§! $TYPE$\n

translation: 你最多能够征集 $PERC$（§Y$NUM$§!）由于：\n

translation: $VASSAL$效忠于$TAX_LIEGE$：$VALUE$

translation: 王权法设定最低值为为：$VALUE$

original: Currently only §Y$NUM$§! $TYPE$ can be raised due to the levy being depleted
translation: 由于征召兵已经耗尽目前只有 §Y$NUM$§! $TYPE$能够被征召

original: Troops
translation: 部队

original: Liege Levy Maintenance: §Y$LEVY$§!\nLiege Tax: §Y$TAX$§!
translation: 领主征召兵维护费：§Y$LEVY$§!\n领主税收：§Y$TAX$§!

original: Liege
translation: 领主

original: \nNo Retinues will be disbanded.
translation: \n近卫军不会被解散。

original: \n§RAll Retinue troops will be disbanded!§!
translation: \n§R所有近卫军将解散。§!

original: Improve Martial Ability
translation: 提升军事能力

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Martial ability, since it is poor (lower than §Y8§!).
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要提升[This.GetHerHis]军事能力，因为它少得可怜（低于 §Y8§!）。

original: You look for some other way to improve your martial ability.
translation: 你寻找其他的提升军事能力的方法。

original: The art of leading men into battle has always fascinated you. To study this critical science, you have ordered the construction of a miniature army in wood. Dear [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] scoffs at you for playing with "toys," but truly, what do womenfolk know of war?
translation: 在战斗中指挥部队的能力一直都吸引着你。为了学习这门关键的学科，你下令用木头制作了一套军队模型。亲爱的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]嘲笑你，说你在摆弄玩具，但是说实话，女人怎么会知道什么是战争？

original: Forward, men! We shall fight to the last!
translation: 前进，士兵们！我们必须战斗到最后一人！

original: You have learned of other enthusiasts in [Root.Location.GetName] who share your interest in miniature armies and pitting them against each other in glorious battle. They will soon be holding a tournament to establish once and for all who the greatest general is. Perhaps you should grace them with your presence?
translation: 你听说在[Root.Location.GetName]有其他的爱好者和你有着共同的兴趣，他们也喜欢摆弄模型军队的战斗。他们很快就要举行一场锦标赛来决定谁是最伟大的将军。也许你应该用你的出场来带给他们荣耀？

original: Yes! My armies will crush all opposition!
translation: 是的！我的军队会碾碎一切对手！

original: No, I have no time to waste on silly games.
translation: 不，我没有时间浪费在这些愚蠢的游戏上。

original: You seek out these kindred spirits.
translation: 你去寻求这些和你有着相同爱好的人。

original: You make your way to the small hovel where the gaming enthusiasts have gathered. Your bodyguards kick open the shack's ramshackle door and announce your presence to the bewildered peasant teenagers inside. They are already sitting around a table, in the midst of a battle with their own painted little armies.
translation: 你来到了游戏爱好者们聚集的小屋。你的卫兵踢开摇摇欲坠的房门，向里面摸不清头脑的年轻农民们宣告你的到来。他们已经围坐在一张桌子周围，正在用他们上色的小兵人打仗。

original: Right then. Who will face me first?
translation: 那么，谁第一个来跟我战斗？

original: your great army meeting defeat on the battlefield.
translation: 你伟大的军队在战斗中遭遇失败。

original: As your armored guards stand at silent attention along the walls of the hut, you do battle with your wooden army. The dice do not roll your way, but at least you have gained several valuable tactical insights. With his miniature cavalry surrounding the last of your army, one of the trembling teenagers asks in a meek voice:\n "D-do you y-yield, m'lord?"
translation: 你用你的木头军队跟人交战，你的卫兵们静静地站立在木屋的墙边保持警戒。色子总是不如你愿，但是至少你收获了一些有价值的战术心得。当他的模型军队包围你最后一支部队的时候，一个年轻人用发抖的声音怯怯的问道：\n「您-您-要-要-投-投降么，大人？」

original: Yield? YIELD?! Guards, take this wretch to the dungeons!
translation: 投降？你叫我投降？卫兵，把这家伙扔到地牢里去！

original: I yield. Well fought, boy!
translation: 我投降。年轻人，出色的战斗！

original: your wooden soldiers carrying the day.
translation: 你的木头士兵在这一天中所向无敌。

original: As your armored guards stand at silent attention along the walls of the hut, you do battle with your wooden army. The dice roll your way and soon your army is the last to remain standing on the table. The frightened striplings watch in silence as you gather up your wooden soldiers and turn to leave with your bodyguard.
translation: 你用你的木头军队跟人交战，你的卫兵们静静地站立在木屋的墙边保持警戒。色子总能摇出你想要的数字，很快在桌子上只剩下你的部队了。这些吓坏了的小伙子静静地看着你把你的木头军队打了包，转身带着你的卫兵离开。

original: We shall have to do this again some time!
translation: 过些时候我们再战！

original: As you make your way home late one night escorted by your bodyguard, you run into several drunken peasants having a fistfight in the middle of the street. Your guards attempt to steer you away, but you have an idea. Would this not be a perfect sparring opportunity in which to improve your martial ability?
translation: 一天深夜，当你在你的卫兵护送下回家的时候，你碰到了几个喝醉的农夫在街道中间打架。你的卫兵试图架着你离开，但是你想到个主意。这难道不是一个完美提升自己军事能力的实战机会吗？

original: Put 'em up!
translation: 把他们扶起来！

original: No, these peasants are beneath me.
translation: 不，这些农民的地位太低了，配不上我。

original: suffering a beating.
translation: 在这场搏斗中受到伤害。

original: After ordering your guards back, you join the wild melee. You get several blows in before the ruffians react to your presence, but things go poorly when you fight one of them on even terms. Soon you lie bruised in the mud, with the taste of blood in your mouth. Your smiling opponent offers his hand to help you up.
translation: 在命令你的卫兵退后之后，你加入了这场混战。在这些暴徒反应过来之前你结结实实的打出了几拳，但是当你和他们中的一人公平的搏斗的时候，事情变得很糟糕。很快你就受伤倒在泥泞中，嘴里充满鲜血的味道。你的对手微微一笑，伸出手来想要帮你起身。

original: Guards, deal with them! No survivors.
translation: 卫兵，把他们处理掉！别留下活口。

original: Thank you for the lesson, friend.
translation: 谢谢你给我上了一课，朋友。

original: administering a beating.
translation: 掌控一场搏斗。

original: After ordering your guards back, you join the wild melee. As the ruffians become aware of your presence they gang up on you, but you are still able to hold your own. You dodge their blows and land several of your own. Soon the peasants are lying unconscious at your feet in the mud.
translation: 在命令你的卫兵退后之后，你加入了这场混战。当这些暴徒注意到你的出现的时候，他们就开始围攻你，但是你仍然能够坚持下去。你先躲过他们的拳头，然后结实地打出几拳。很快这些农夫倒在你脚下的泥泞中不省人事。

original: Thank you for this dance, gentlemen, but I must be off.
translation: 先生们，感谢陪我跳完这支舞，但是我必须离开了。

original: It is rumored that a great warrior from the distant east is currently passing through [Root.Location.GetName]. He is said to have taken part in a hundred battles or more, and his legendary fighting skills are supposedly without peer. Perhaps he could be persuaded to pass on some of his knowledge to you...
translation: 有传言说一个来自遥远东方的伟大武士正路过[Root.Location.GetName]。听说他参加过一百多场战斗，他传奇的战斗技能恐怕无人能敌。你也许能够说服他把他的知识传授一部分给你……

original: This man must be found!
translation: 一定要找到这个人！

original: After a long search you find the fabled warrior you had been looking for at a local inn. Reeking of spirits, the old man is soundly asleep under a table. His sword is of an unfamiliar make and the man's appearance certainly betrays his eastern origins, but could this really be the legendary fighter you seek? The innkeeper will not let him leave until someone pays his bill.
translation: 在经过长时间的搜索之后，你在当地的一个小酒馆里找到了这个传说中的武士。这个老人正浑身冒着臭气地躺在桌子底下熟睡。他的剑的形状不同寻常，而且他的外表清楚地暴露了他来自遥远的东方，但这真是我们寻找的那个传奇武士么？酒馆的老板不让他离开，除非有人能帮他付清账单。

original: Just another drunken fool.
translation: 又是一个喝醉的傻瓜。

original: I will pay...
translation: 我会付这笔钱的……

original: You pay the old man's tab.
translation: 你支付了这个老人的账单。

original: As the old man struggles to recover from his hangover, you explain, in a quiet voice, your quest to improve your martial ability. You ask if he would teach you. He breaks into laughter and winces from the headache this produces. Then it dawns on him that you aren't joking. "Very well, [Root.GetFirstName]-san. I promise teach, you promise learn. I say, you do, no questions."
translation: 在这个老人从他的宿醉中挣扎着醒来的时候，你用平静的声音向他解释了你想要提升你的战斗技巧的想法。你问他可不可以当你的老师。他大笑起来，又很快因为头痛而停止了笑声。接着他发现你不是在开玩笑。「好的，[Root.GetFirstName]桑，我教，你学，我说，你做，不要问任何问题。」

original: You have a deal.
translation: 成交。

original: No way, old man!
translation: 没门，老家伙！

original: Your training begins.
translation: 你的训练开始了。

original: The old warrior from the east has settled down in your castle, and your training is proceeding well. One day as you walk into his room, you see the man trying to catch a fly with the pair of small wooden sticks he insists on using whenever he eats. You inquire why, and he explains: "Man who catch fly with chopstick accomplish anything."
translation: 这个来自东方的年老的武士在你的城堡中住了下来，你的训练进行的十分顺利。某天，当你走进他的房间的时候，你看见他正试图用两根小木棍夹住一只苍蝇。不管他在什么时候吃东西，他都坚持用这两根小木棍。你问他为什么这么做，他解释说：「能够用筷子夹住苍蝇的人可以做到任何事情。」

original: What?
translation: 你说什么？

original: Your training continues...
translation: 你继续你的训练……

original: You take a boat trip with your old warrior teacher on a nearby lake. As he fishes, you stand up in the boat and practise the moves he has taught you. "When am I going to learn how to punch?" you ask. The man rocks the boat and you lose your footing, falling into the water. You resurface to his roaring laughter. "Learn how punch, after you learn how keep dry! You all wet behind ear!"
translation: 你和你的武士老师一起在附近的一座湖上坐船旅行。在他钓鱼的时候，你在船上站起身来练习他教给你的动作。「我什么时候开始学习如何出拳呢？」你问道。他摇晃了一下船，你失去平衡掉进了水中。你从水面钻出来的时候正看见他在大笑。「想要学如何出拳，先学习如何不把身上弄湿吧！你现在浑身都湿透了！」

original: That's it, old man! I've had it with you! We're done!
translation: 到此为止了，老家伙！我受够你了！我们之间的关系结束了！

original: Sigh...
translation: 叹气……

original: As dusk falls after an intense day of sparring, you watch the setting sun from the castle ramparts together with your warrior mentor. "I teach you many things, [Root.GetFirstName]-san," your mentor says, "but most important lesson in fight... is no get hit." The next morning, your training concluded, the old warrior has departed your castle. No one saw him leave.
translation: 在一天的激烈搏斗之后，薄暮降临，你在城堡的城墙上面和你的武士导师一起看着夕阳西下。「我教了你很多东西，[Root.GetFirstName]桑，」你的导师说道，「但是在战斗中，最重要的一课就是……不要被击中。」第二天早上，你的训练结束了，老武士离开了你的城堡。没有人看见他离开。

original: Well, I suppose I learned something.
translation: 好吧，我想我还是学到了些真材实料的。

original: Improve Stewardship
translation: 提升管理能力

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Stewardship, since it is poor (lower than §Y8§!).
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要提升[This.GetHerHis]管理能力，因为它少得可怜（低于 §Y8§!）。

original: You look for some other way to improve your stewardship.
translation: 你寻找其他提升你的管理能力的途径。

original: As you travel by carriage on a road in [Root.Location.GetName], you pass by what appears to be an old shuttered inn. The sight of it fills you with questions. What forced them to close down? Could you do a better job than the previous owners? Perhaps this would be a golden opportunity to improve your stewardship...
translation: 当你乘坐马车走在[Root.Location.GetName]的路上的时候，你经过了一座似乎倒闭了的老酒馆.这一场景让你不禁陷入了深深的思考.是什么让他们不得不关闭它呢？你能不能比之前的所有者干得更加出色呢？也许这是提升你的管理能力的黄金机会……

original: It is settled! I will buy the inn!
translation: 就这么定了！我将买下这座酒馆！

original: No, I will not sink any money into that ruin.
translation: 不，我不会在这堆废墟上浪费一分钱。

original: You buy the inn and begin efforts to restore it.
translation: 你买下了酒馆并开始试图恢复它。

original: The vagrants in your new inn have been evicted, the holes in the roof have been patched and the whole building has been thoroughly aired out to cleanse it of the most offensive odors. New staff has been hired, and the time has come for you to decide on a name for your inn.
translation: 住在你的新酒馆里的流浪汉已经被赶了出去，房顶上的洞已经被补好，整座建筑经过了充分的通风来清除掉大部分的刺激气味。已经聘请了新的员工，现在到了为你的酒馆命名的时候。

original: The Bottomless Tankard!
translation: 无底啤酒杯！

original: The Mead Fountain!
translation: 蜂蜜酒喷泉！

original: The Jester's Choice!
translation: 小丑的抉择！

original: The Drunken Squire!
translation: 酒鬼老爷！

original: The Crescent Oasis!
translation: 新月绿洲！

original: The Crossed Scimitars Club!
translation: 交叉弯刀俱乐部！

original: The Frank, the Saracen and the Tartar!
translation: 法兰克，撒拉逊与鞑靼！

original: The Desert Watering Hole!
translation: 沙漠酒泉！

original: A name is chosen.
translation: 选中了一个名字。

original: Things are very busy at your new inn, with everyone preparing for the grand opening night. Guests will be able to sample turnips for free, but if you added a generous amount of salt to them, people might become more thirsty and mead sales would increase...
translation: 你的新酒馆事务繁忙，每个人都在准备晚上盛大的开张典礼.顾客们会免费试用萝卜，但是如果你在萝卜里面加入大量的盐，人们或许会变得越来越渴，蜂蜜酒的销量可能会增加……

original: Add 10% salt!
translation: 增加10%的盐！

original: Add 20% salt!
translation: 增加20%的盐！

original: Add 30% salt!
translation: 增加30%的盐！

original: Add all the salt we have, damn you!
translation: 把我们所有的盐都加进去，该死的！

original: The turnips are salted.
translation: 萝卜中加入了盐。

original: Your inn will soon open to the public, but one last detail demands your attention before the opening night. Some form of act or spectable will need to be booked to keep the guests around. After scouring the lands for what passes for entertainment, you conclude that the following options are available to you:
translation: 你的酒馆很快就要向公众开放了，但是在晚上开张之前还有最后一个细节需要你来确定。一些表演需要预订来留住客人。在搜索过本地的娱乐活动之后，你总结出了以下几个待选选项：

original: A lengthy sermon on the evils of vice by a local clergyman.
translation: 请一位本地神职人员做一个冗长的布道讲一讲恶习的罪恶。

original: A travelling bard from distant lands.
translation: 一个来自遥远地方的吟游诗人。

original: A renowned eunuch castrato singer.
translation: 一个知名的阉伶歌手。

original: A wild ass that allegedly speaks and recites poetry.
translation: 一头据说可以说话并背诵诗歌的野驴。

original: You book the clergyman.
translation: 你订下了神职人员。

original: Probably not your brightest idea, but you invite the clergyman to speak at the grand opening of your inn. He conducted a sermon on the importance of leading a righteous and temperate life. The sermon lasted for some time, until the clergyman was too drunk to remain coherent... or stand upright.
translation: 也许这不是你做出的最好的选择，但是你邀请了神职人员在你的酒馆的盛大开张仪式上讲话。他做了一次关于过正直有节制的生活的布道。布道持续了一段时间，直到神职人员喝得太多不能保持理智……或者说连站都站不直了。

original: Sales actually improved...
translation: 销量确实得到了提升……

original: You book the bard.
translation: 你订下了吟游诗人。

original: The bard you hired for your inn's opening night was from far away and spoke a peculiar language, yet despite this there was a strangely compelling elegance and rythm to his poetry and song. At least people seemed to think so. Sales were good, so you see no reason to complain.
translation: 你为你的酒馆开业雇佣的诗人来自遥远的地方，说着一种怪异的语言，但是如果抛开这些不管，他的诗歌具有一种奇怪的强制性的优雅和韵律。至少大家都这么认为。销量也很好，所以你没有任何理由去抱怨。

original: Keep the mead flowing!
translation: 不要中断蜂蜜酒的供应！

original: You book the eunuch.
translation: 你订下了阉人。

original: The eunuch's castrato singing was quite unlike anything you had heard before, but unfortunately a large fight errupted near the stage as people crowded around it to see where the shrill wailing was coming from. Your ears are still ringing from the singer's high-pitched shrieks when the fighting spilled onto the stage...
translation: 阉伶歌手的歌声与你之前听过的任何歌声都截然不同，但是不幸的是在舞台附近爆发了一场大规模的斗殴，因为人们都挤在台边上想要知道这尖细的声音是从哪里传出来的。当斗殴蔓延到台上的时候，你还在因为歌手的高音尖叫而耳鸣……

original: At least the singing is over now.
translation: 至少现在歌声已经结束了。

original: You book the wild ass.
translation: 你订下了那头野驴。

original: The wild ass sat on the grand stage of your inn for the better part of an hour, and although it relieved itself twice on the wooden floor, no speech or poetry was forthcoming. To your horror, the agitated animal then ran amok amongst the audience, resulting in fleeing customers and four broken tables.
translation: 那头野驴坐在你的酒馆的大舞台上过了大半个钟头，虽然它在木地板上拉了两泡翔，但没听到任何演讲或者诗歌。让你惊骇的是，这头受惊的动物疯狂地在观众中横冲直撞，引起了顾客的逃跑并且打碎了四张桌子。

original: They... they told me it spoke! I swear!
translation: 他们……他们告诉过我它会讲话！我发誓！

original: Well, that was a disaster. The people who sampled your turnips suffered violent bouts of illness, and the rest cleared out in short order after the first guests hurled their stomach contents on your floor.
translation: 好吧，这是一场灾难。试吃过你的萝卜的人爆发了急性的疾病，在第一批客人在你的地板上大吐特吐之后，剩下的人群就都散掉了。

original: Too much salt?
translation: 盐放得太多啦？

original: The salt trick actually seems to have worked! Who would have thought? The thirst of your guests seemed unquenchable and mead sales exceeded expections!
translation: 加盐的把戏看上去奏效了！谁会想的到呢？你的客人们口渴难耐，蜂蜜酒的销量超出啦预期！

original: I made a nice little profit.
translation: 我获得了一小份不错的利润。

original: The opening night of your inn has concluded, and the time has come for you to move on from this venture and resume your other duties. Whatever else can be said, you have learned many valuable lessons on running a business. A buyer is ready to take the inn off your hands, at a tidy little profit for you.
translation: 你的酒馆的开张之夜结束了，已经到了你结束这段冒险回到你的其他职责的时间了。无论如何，你已经学到了许多关于经营一份事业的经验。一位买家已经准备好接手你的酒馆，并给你留出一小份利润。

original: It was nice while it lasted.
translation: 这个酒馆能够继续运营下去是件好事。

original: It has been brought to your attention that the large garden outside your castle is, frankly, a mess. Last week one of your courtiers got lost in that wilderness, and the man did not emerge for two days. Tackling this garden problem head on could be an excellent project with which to improve your stewardship.
translation: 你注意到你的城堡外面的花园确实是一团糟。上一周你的一位朝臣甚至在那荒野中迷失了方向，他有两天没有露面。迎难而上去处理这个花园的问题会是一个提高你的管理能力的很好的项目。

original: Time to stretch those green fingers!
translation: 到了解决这个花园问题的时候了！

original: No, gardening is for weaklings and the clergy.
translation: 不，园艺是那些老弱和教士的事情。

original: Together with your gardeners, you have redesigned your castle garden into a more managable form. You have organized the digging of a small canal system to keep your plants watered, the weeds have been removed and the hedge maze now actually has an exit. The skeletal remains strewn about the maze's dead ends have also been cleared out.
translation: 和你的园丁一起，你把你的城堡花园重新设计成更容易管理的形式。你组织挖掘了一小套水渠系统来浇灌植物，杂草被移除，篱笆迷宫现在确实有一个出口。在迷宫的死胡同里的骨骼遗骸也被清除了。

original: Hard but rewarding work. I have learned much.
translation: 困难但是有回报的工作。我学到了很多。

original: Improve Learning
translation: 提升学识

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Learning, since it is poor (lower than §Y8§!).
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要提升[This.GetHerHis]学识，因为它少得可怜（低于 §Y8§!）。

original: You look for some other way to improve your learning.
translation: 你寻找其他的增进学识的途径。

original: As you watch some birds darting nimbly through the air, you find yourself wondering why it is that man cannot do the same. There have been unsuccessful attempts to make flying contraptions in the past, but clearly those designs were all conceived by fools. Building a machine that can fly will help improve your learning...
translation: 在你观察一些鸟在天上敏捷的掠过的时候，你发现你自己正在想着为什么人不能做同样的事情。过去有过不成功的发明飞行装置的尝试，但是很明显那些设计都是由傻瓜想出来的。制造一个会飞的机械可以帮助你提高你的学识……

original: Yes! I am sure it can be done.
translation: 是的！我确定它能被制造出来。

original: No, we belong with our feet planted firmly on the ground.
translation: 不，我们人类就是要双脚牢固的植根于大地之上。

original: You begin your research.
translation: 你开始了你的研究。

original: In your quest to build a flying machine, you spend countless hours with dusty old tomes and parchments in an effort to learn about all the failed attempts to fly, lest you repeat their mistakes. You are finally at the point where you feel you have learned enough to begin construction of a prototype.
translation: 在你制造飞行机的探求中，为了了解所有的想要飞行的失败尝试，你花费了无数的时间阅读积满灰尘的古老著作和羊皮纸，以免重复他们的错误。最终你觉得你已经了解的已经够多了，可以开始建造原型机了。

original: I will rule the skies.
translation: 我将统治天空。

original: Construction begins!
translation: 开始建造！

original: The prototype of your flying machine is nearing completion, but it would probably be ill-advised to pilot the thing yourself on its maiden flight. Fortunately, you know of several promising candidates who could probably be persuaded to take this historic leap of faith on your behalf.
translation: 你的飞行机的原型机马上就要完成了，但是如果它的处女航由你自己驾驶就太不明智了。幸运的是，你认识几个有可能被说服替你从事这一历史性飞跃的候选人。

original: Otis, the cook's overweight son.
translation: 奥提斯，厨子的胖儿子。

original: Meldrick, local dung gatherer and dogsbody.
translation: 梅尔德里克，本地的拾粪工和杂役。

original: The dog belonging to the blacksmith's daughter.
translation: 铁匠的女儿的狗。

original: al-Otis, the cook's overweight son.
translation: 阿尔-奥提斯，厨子的胖儿子。

original: Ba'ah al-Drik, local dung gatherer and dogsbody.
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克，本地的拾粪工和杂役。

original: You enlist the aid of Otis.
translation: 你说服奥提斯提供帮助。

original: You find a suitably steep cliff from which to launch the maiden flight of your flying machine. Otis agrees to be strapped into the contraption, especially after you bribe him with sweets. You give him a gentle push over the cliff and leave the rest to fate and the wind. He plummets down like a sack of stones, trailing debris.
translation: 你找到了一个适合的陡崖来进行你的飞行机的处女航。奥提斯同意被绑在你的发明上，特别是在你用糖果贿赂他之后。你轻轻地把他推下悬崖，把剩下的事情留给命运和风。他像一袋石头一样笔直下坠，留下一地碎片。

original: Otis? Move your leg if you are still alive.
translation: 奥提斯？如果你还活着就动一下腿。

original: You enlist the aid of al-Otis.
translation: 你说服阿尔-奥提斯提供帮助。

original: You find a suitably steep cliff from which to launch the maiden flight of your flying machine. al-Otis agrees to be strapped into the contraption, especially after you bribe him with sweets. You give him a gentle push over the cliff and leave the rest to fate and the wind. He plummets down like a sack of stones, trailing debris.
translation: 你找到了一个适合的陡崖来进行你的飞行机的处女航。阿尔-奥提斯同意被绑在你的发明上，特别是在你用糖果贿赂他之后。你轻轻地把他推下悬崖，把剩下的事情留给命运和风。他像一袋石头一样笔直下坠，留下一地碎片。

original: al-Otis? Move your leg if you are still alive.
translation: 阿尔-奥提斯？如果你还活着就动一下腿。

original: You enlist the aid of Meldrick.
translation: 你说服梅尔德里克提供帮助。

original: You find a suitably steep cliff from which to launch the maiden flight of your flying machine. Meldrick hesitates, but after a combination of threats and cajoling he agrees to be strapped into the contraption. You push him over the cliff and hope for the best. He plummets down like a sack of stones, trailing debris.
translation: 你找到了一个适合的陡崖来进行你的飞行机的处女航。梅尔德里克有些犹豫，但是你连威胁带哄骗地让他同意被绑在你的发明上。你把他推下悬崖，并祈求得取得成功。他像一袋石头一样笔直下坠，留下一地碎片。

original: M-Meldrick?
translation: 梅-梅尔德里克？

original: You enlist the aid of Ba'ah al-Drik.
translation: 你说服巴阿赫·德里克提供帮助。

original: You find a suitably steep cliff from which to launch the maiden flight of your flying machine. Ba'ah al-Drik hesitates, but after a combination of threats and cajoling he agrees to be strapped into the contraption. You push him over the cliff and hope for the best. He plummets down like a sack of stones, trailing debris.
translation: 你找到了一个适合的陡崖来进行你的飞行机的处女航。巴阿赫·德里克有些犹豫，但是你连威胁带哄骗他地让同意被绑在你的发明上。你把他推下悬崖，并祈求取得成功。他像一袋石头一样笔直下坠，留下一地碎片。

original: Ba'ah al-Drik?
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克？

original: You press-gang the dog into your service.
translation: 你把那条狗强抓来做实验。

original: You find a suitably steep cliff from which to launch the maiden flight of your flying machine. Before you can strap the dog into the contraption, the furious blacksmith, an ogre of a man, approaches with his crying daughter. You quickly decide to take the dog's place. As you dive off the cliff, the machine disintegrates around you.
translation: 你找到了一个适合的陡崖来进行你的飞行机的处女航。在你把这条狗绑在你的发明上之前，愤怒的铁匠，一个人形怪物，带着他嚎啕大哭的女儿走近你。你迅速决定由自己替换那条狗的位置。在你坠下悬崖的时候，这台机器在你周围散了架。

original: AAAAHHHhhhhh...
translation: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊……

original: You hurry down to the wreckage...
translation: 你急忙跑到残骸那里……

original: After carefully examining the wreckage of your flying machine, you conclude that the physique of Otis was simply too much for its delicate frame to bear. At any rate, the ungrateful boy now refuses to have anything to do with your machines. It looks like you will have to fly the next prototype yourself.
translation: 在仔细检查了你的飞行机的残骸之后，你得出结论，你的飞行机的精致骨架无法承受奥提斯的庞大体型。无论如何，这个忘恩负义的男孩都拒绝再与你的机器有任何联系。看起来你不得不亲自实验下一部原型机。

original: I do this for the betterment of mankind.
translation: 我是为了全人类做这件事情。

original: No, that thing is clearly a deathtrap!
translation: 不，那显然是一个死亡陷阱！

original: After carefully examining the wreckage of your flying machine, you conclude that the physique of al-Otis was simply too much for its delicate frame to bear. At any rate, the ungrateful boy now refuses to have anything to do with your machines. It looks like you will have to fly the next prototype yourself.
translation: 在仔细检查了你的飞行机的残骸之后，你得出结论，你的飞行机的精致骨架无法承受阿尔-奥提斯的庞大体型。无论如何，这个忘恩负义的男孩都拒绝再与你的机器有任何联系。看起来你不得不亲自实验下一部原型机。

original: Meldrick is bruised and battered, but alive. Your flying machine was a failure, and to make matters worse, another scholar in [Root.Location.GetName] has allegedly made his own functioning prototype. Just as you are about to surrender to despair, Meldrick gives you a toothless smile and says: "I have a cunning plan."
translation: 梅尔德里克浑身擦伤和瘀伤，但是仍然活着。你的飞行机是一次失败，让情况变得更糟的是，据说[Root.Location.GetName]的另一位学者已经制造了他自己的能够工作的原型机。就在你准备在绝望中认输的时候，梅尔德里克给你一个不露齿的微笑，他说道：「我有一个狡猾的计划。」

original: I will regret this, but let's hear it.
translation: 也许我以后会后悔，但是让我们听一听你的计划。

original: Then keep it to yourself, nitwit!
translation: 那就把你的计划留给你自己吧，八嘎！

original: Ba'ah al-Drik is bruised and battered, but alive. Your flying machine was a failure, and to make matters worse, another scholar in [Root.Location.GetName] has allegedly made his own functioning prototype. Just as you are about to surrender to despair, Ba'ah al-Drik gives you a toothless smile and says: "I have a cunning plan."
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克浑身擦伤和瘀伤，但是仍然活着。你的飞行机是一次失败，让情况变得更糟的是，据说[Root.Location.GetName]的另一位学者已经制造了他自己的能够工作的原型机。就在你准备在绝望中认输的时候，巴阿赫·德里克给你一个不露齿的微笑，他说道：「我有一个狡猾的计划。」

original: The ground rushes towards you.
translation: 大地迎面向你扑来。

original: As you lie in your bedchamber, bruised and battered but still alive, you contemplate the nature of your plummet from the cliff. Your flying machine has been destroyed and you may never see a human soaring through the air, but this experience has taught you much about the value of science and scholarly research.
translation: 你躺在你的卧室，你浑身擦伤和瘀伤但是仍然活着，你沉思着你从悬崖上的坠落的道理。你的飞行器已经毁掉了，你也许永远不会看见一个人类在天空中翱翔，但是这次经历让你学到了许多科学和学术研究的价值。

original: Per ardua ad astra.
translation: 越过逆境，迈向明星。

original: You prepare a second prototype.
translation: 你准备制造第二台原型机。

original: With a new and improved flying machine, you return to the cliff. Otis waits below, as you will take the fateful plunge yourself this time. You close your eyes and leap into the air from the cliff. For a few seconds you feel the wind rushing past your face until something soft breaks your fall. It is Otis.
translation: 带着一台新制造的改进型飞行机，你回到了这个悬崖。奥提斯在底下等着，因为这次你将亲自进行这场重大的冒险。你紧闭双眼跳下悬崖。有那么几秒你感到风从你的脸颊滑过，直到什么柔软的东西打断了你的下坠.是奥提斯。

original: I was flying! Otis, did you see? ...Otis?
translation: 我刚才飞了起来！奥提斯，你看见了么……奥提斯？

original: With a new and improved flying machine, you return to the cliff. al-Otis waits below, as you will take the fateful plunge yourself this time. You close your eyes and leap into the air from the cliff. For a few seconds you feel the wind rushing past your face until something soft breaks your fall. It is al-Otis.
translation: 带着一台新制造的改进型飞行机，你回到了这个悬崖。阿尔-奥提斯在底下等着，因为这次你将亲自进行这场重大的冒险。你紧闭双眼跳下悬崖。有那么几秒你感到风从你的脸颊滑过，直到什么柔软的东西打断了你的下坠。是阿尔-奥提斯。

original: I was flying! al-Otis, did you see? ...al-Otis?
translation: 我刚才飞了起来！阿尔-奥提斯，你看见了吗……阿尔-奥提斯？

original: Meldrick puts his plan into action.
translation: 梅尔德里克把他的计划付诸实施。

original: How he did it will forever remain a mystery, but Meldrick has managed to steal the rival scholar's flying machine. He gleefully brings it to the cliff, but his grin vanishes when you inform him he will be flying again. You send him over the cliff and Meldrick enters a brief, spiraling dive before slamming into the ground.
translation: 虽然不知道怎么回事，但是梅尔德里克成功地偷到了你的竞争对手的飞行机。他得意地把它带到了悬崖，但是当你告诉他他将会再飞一次的时候，他的笑颜消逝了。你把他推下悬崖，在经历了短暂的螺旋状的下坠之后，梅尔德里克撞上了大地。

original: So it wasn't just my machine... I feel better now.
translation: 所以不只是我的机器失败了……我现在感觉好多了。

original: Ba'ah al-Drik puts his plan into action.
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克把他的计划付诸实施。

original: How he did it will forever remain a mystery, but Ba'ah al-Drik has managed to steal the rival scholar's flying machine. He gleefully brings it to the cliff, but his grin vanishes when you inform him he will be flying again. You send him over the cliff and Ba'ah al-Drik enters a brief, spiraling dive before slamming into the ground.
translation: 虽然不知道怎么回事，但是巴阿赫·德里克成功地偷到了你的竞争对手的飞行机。他得意地把它带到了悬崖，但是当你告诉他他将会再飞一次的时候，他的笑颜消逝了。你把他推下悬崖，在经历了短暂的螺旋状的下坠之后，巴阿赫·德里克撞上了大地。

original: You head home.
translation: 你掉头回家。

original: Despite your efforts, it seems the secrets of flight will have to be uncovered by future generations. Your attempts may have been unsuccessful, but you have learned much about the value of science and scholarly research. Your learning has improved.
translation: 尽管你努力过了，但是看起来飞行的秘密还要留待后来人来揭开。你的尝试也许是不成功的，但是你学到了很多关于科学和学术研究的价值。你的学识得到了提升。

original: I'la' al-a'la fi sabil al-magd.
translation: 安拉，至高的安拉，安拉的启示。

original: Improve Diplomacy
translation: 提升外交能力

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Diplomacy, since it is poor (lower than §Y8§!).
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要提升[This.GetHerHis]外交能力，因为它少得可怜（低于 §Y8§!）。

original: You look for some other way to improve your diplomacy.
translation: 你寻找其他提升你的外交能力的途径。

original: There are two peasant families in [Root.Capital.GetName] who have been locked in a bitter feud for generations. This conflict has now escalated to the point where it is even discussed in circles of nobility. Although this feud would normally be far beneath your notice, this could be a golden opportunity to practise your diplomacy...
translation: [Root.Capital.GetName]中两户农民之间激烈的世仇已延续了许多代人。这一争执现已严重到甚至贵族圈子里都会谈论此事。尽管这种吵闹通常来说远不会引起你的注意，但这也许是锻炼你外交能力的绝佳机会……

original: I will put an end to this squabble.
translation: 我会给这一争论画上句号。

original: No, let the riff-raff sort out their own problems.
translation: 不，让这些刁民自己解决他们的问题。

original: You sponsor a meeting between the families.
translation: 你主办了一场两家之间的会面。

original: You have invited the two feuding families to a local inn hoping to reach some kind of agreement. The peasants are seated at two opposing tables on either side of your position in the middle. Some have brought pitchforks, one clutches a live chicken, and all of them look moderately inbred. This could be a challenge...
translation: 你邀请这两户有世仇的家庭一同来到一座当地的酒馆，希望他们能够达成某种共识。两户农民分坐在桌子的两旁，你坐在桌子的中间。有人带着草叉来，有人抓着一只活鸡，他们所有的人都看起来像近亲繁殖的产物。这是一个挑战……

original: Appeal to their sense of reason.
translation: 引导他们进行理性思考。

original: Flatter them.
translation: 恭维他们。

original: Find common ground.
translation: 找到共同之处。

original: You try a different strategy to win them over.
translation: 你尝试了一种不同的策略来说服他们。

original: "This petty feud cannot continue," you begin. "What do you suppose would happen if the great noble houses fought each other as you do, instead of working together for the common good? You must learn from our shining example and - "
translation: 「这种琐碎的世仇不能持续下去，」你开始说道，「你们认为如果大贵族家庭也像你们一样互相争斗，而不是为了共同的利益一起合作的话，会发生什么呢？你们向我们高贵的榜样学习并且——」

original: The peasants shout you down!
translation: 这些农民大喊着打断了你的话！

original: "My friends," you say with as warm a smile as you can muster. "I think you know why I have called your great families here. As you suffer from this tragic conflict, the entire realm suffers with you."
translation: 「我的朋友们，」你带着尽可能温暖的微笑说道，「我认为你们知道为什么我把你们两大家子都叫到这里来。当你们受难于这一悲剧的冲突，整个王国也和你们一同受难。」

original: Mention their patriotic duty.
translation: 提及他们的爱国义务

original: Soothe their tempers.
translation: 舒缓他们的情绪。

original: "As some of you may know, my parentage has often been put into question," you start, rising from your seat. "There have been cruel whispers labeling me an 'inbred freak.' I know that many of you here have suffered the same injustices, and I come to you now as an understanding friend."
translation: 「你们中有些人可能知道，我的血统经常被人质疑，」你开始说道，你从椅子上站起身来，「有一些残酷的流言把我说成一个『近亲繁殖的怪胎』。我知道你们中的很多人也经历过同样的不公正，我是作为你们的一位知心的朋友来到这里的。」

original: You continue, in a harsher voice: "But at the same time, you have a duty and a responsibility to the crown! You fight each other on the street, and we look away. You ruin entire harvests for each other, and we look away. Not again. The line must be drawn here! This far, no furth - "
translation: 你继续语调严厉地说道：「但是同时你们有对于国王应尽的责任和义务！你们在街上互相斗殴，我们假装没看见；你们毁掉对方的整个收成，我们假装没看见；然而事不过三。这条线必须画在这里！只能到这么远，不能更远——」

original: In a firm but kind voice, you say: "Many of you are angry, I know. You have every reason to be. Too much blood has been spilled between your families for things to be smoothed over, but there comes a time when one has to look to the future."
translation: 用坚定但是和蔼的语调，你说道：「你们中的许多人感到愤怒，我知道。你们有足够的理由愤怒。你们两个家庭之间已经流下了太多的鲜血，仇恨已经不可缓和，但是现在到了不得不面向未来的时候了。」

original: Threaten them with violence.
translation: 用暴力威胁他们。

original: Lambast their childish behavior.
translation: 为他们孩子气的行为鞭打他们。

original: For dramatic effect, you pull out a dagger and stab it into the table with all your might. "Because if you do not, I can assure you that there will BE no future for your families! I will personally hunt down every single one of you, and make sure that - "
translation: 为了更有戏剧效果，你拔出一把短剑并把它用力插在桌子上。「因为如果你们不消除仇恨的话，我可以保证你们两个家庭都没有未来！我会亲自对你们每个人穷追到底，并且确保——」

original: You thump your fist on the table for dramatic effect. "In the end, are we not all adults here? It is so easy to resort to the bickering of children, for nobility and commoners alike, but that is when we must find the inner strength to rise above such pettiness! Let us walk out of here as the adults we are! What say you?"
translation: 为了戏剧效果，你把你的拳头重重地砸在桌子上。「归根结底，在这里的我们都是成年人。对于贵族以及平民来说，像小孩子一样吵嘴太简单了，但是现在是我们必须找寻我们内在的力量来超脱这些琐事的时候了！让我们像个成年人一样走出仇恨！你们怎么说？」

original: The peasants stand up in unison...
translation: 这些农民一同站了起来……

original: It looks like things will be turning violent...
translation: 看起来事情将会变得暴力……

original: You barely have time to dodge the chicken someone hurls your way. With a howl the two families leap over their tables and throw themselves at each other with you caught in the middle. Clothes torn and covered in bruises, you eventually manage to crawl out of the inn as the fighting continues inside...
translation: 你勉强躲过了一个人向你猛扔过来的鸡。两个家庭的成员嚎叫着翻过他们面前的桌子冲向对方，你正好被夹在两家中间。你衣衫破烂，满身是伤，最终设法从酒馆爬了出来，里面的斗殴还在继续……

original: Well, I did my best...
translation: 好吧，我尽力了……

original: The inn turns silent.
translation: 酒馆变得一片寂静。

original: Though it is doubtful whether they understood half of what you said, most of your message seems to have carried over. The peasants give a rousing applause. Crying members from the two families hug each other, and at least two marriages between their bloodlines are agreed upon on the spot. It seems the feud is over.
translation: 虽然他们是否理解了你说的话的一半都值得怀疑，你的大部分的信息似乎传达了出去。这些农民们热烈地鼓掌。两个家庭的成员哭泣着抱在了一起，至少有两件两个家庭之间的婚事当场确定了下来。看上去这个世仇终于结束了。

original: Well, that went better than expected.
translation: 好吧，这比预想的要好。

original: You have come into possession of "The Confessions of St. Augustine," a series of tomes detailing the life and times of Augustine of Hippo, a Christian theologian from Roman Africa who lived many centuries ago. Studying this historical work could provide insights that improve your learning.
translation: 你偶然获得了一套《奥古斯丁忏悔录》，这是好几册详细记述希坡的奥古斯丁的生活历程的书，他是一位几个世纪前出生于罗马帝国北非地区的基督教神学家。阅读这部历史著作可以增进你的学识。

original: I will read every word.
translation: 我将会仔细读每一个单词。

original: No... not enough pictures.
translation: 不……图片太少了。

original: You lock yourself away with the book.
translation: 你把自己和这本书一起关了起来。

original: At last, you have finished your studies of St. Augustine's Confessions. It took many nights of reading with only the light of a candle to keep you company, but you do not regret a second of it. Your learning has improved.
translation: 最终，你读完了圣奥古斯丁的忏悔录。这花费了你好几个夜晚，在仅有一根蜡烛照明的时候苦读，但是你一点都不感到后悔。因为你的学识增加了。

original: This work contained many truths.
translation: 这部著作包含有许多真理。

original: You have come into possession of the Shahnameh, an epic poem written by the Persian poet Ferdowsi. It chronicles the history of Persia, telling the stories of its early kings up until the Arab conquest and the spread of Islam. Studying this historical work could provide insights that improve your learning.
translation: 你偶然获得了一本列王纪，这是一部由波斯诗人菲多尔西创作的史诗。它记录了波斯的编年史，讲述了从远古神话时期到阿拉伯征服以及伊斯兰教传播的波斯诸王的故事。阅读这本历史著作可以增进你的学识。

original: At last, you have finished your studies of the Shahnameh. It took many nights of reading with only the light of a candle to keep you company, but you do not regret a second of it. Your learning has improved.
translation: 最终，你读完了列王纪。这花费了你好几个夜晚，在仅有一根蜡烛照明的时候苦读，但是你一点都不感到后悔。因为你的学识增加了。

original: There is an old hermit somewhere in the back country of [Root.Capital.GetName] who is said to possess great wisdom as well as a razor-sharp wit. Some claim he once served in the clergy, others say he was a mercenary captain who decided to put down his arms for good. Whatever his past, many seek him out for counsel. Will you?
translation: 在[Root.Capital.GetName]的后山有一老隐士，他的智慧博大如汪洋。一些声称他曾经是神职人员，而另一些说他是个弃武从善的佣兵首领。无论他的过去如何，许多人想找到他咨询。那么你呢？

original: I shall find this hermit.
translation: 我必须找到这个隐士。

original: Me, take advice from a decrepit old man? Hardly.
translation: 让我从一个老不死那里得到建议？休想。

original: You prepare for a journey to the hermit's cave.
translation: 你为前往隐士的洞穴做准备。

original: With a mule as your only company, you depart for the hermit's cave. The journey is long and the roads, where they exist at all, are in poor condition. Finally, after reaching the end of a narrow mountain path, you come upon the cave. A ragged piece of cloth is all that shields the entrance from the outside elements.
translation: 你出发前往隐士的洞穴，只有一头骡子陪着你。旅程十分漫长，而且路况十分糟糕（如果这也算路的话）。最终，在走道一条狭窄的山路尽头之后，你来到了这座洞穴。入口处只有一块破布遮挡着。

original: Old man, show yourself!
translation: 老家伙，快自己出来！

original: You hear someone shuffling around inside the cave.
translation: 你听见洞里面有慢吞吞的脚步声。

original: The cloth parts slightly to reveal the face of a gnarled old man. He regards you in silence for a moment with his beady eyes, then disappears behind the cloth again. "No solicitors!" he shouts.
translation: 破布慢慢分开，露出了一张扭曲的老人的脸。他用他咄咄逼人的眼睛沉默的看了你一会儿，然后又消失在破布后面。「不要找我推销东西！」他喊道。

original: I have travelled far, old man! I will not be denied!
translation: 我走了很远的路，老家伙！我绝不接受任何拒绝！

original: Oh well. I'll be off again then.
translation: 哦好吧，我还会来的。

original: You don't take no for an answer and enter the cave.
translation: 你不能接受这个否定的回答，进入了这个洞穴。

original: You push the curtain aside and enter the dark cave. Deep inside you find the hermit, seated on a cushion in flickering candlelight. He seems to be in some kind of trance at first, but then he opens an eye and looks at you with mild annoyance. "I thought I said... oh, spit it out then! What do you want?"
translation: 你推开帘布，走进了这个阴暗的洞穴。在洞深处你找到了这个隐士，他坐在一个垫子上，洞中烛光摇曳。他起初看起来在昏睡，但是接着他睁开眼睛带着轻微的恼怒看着你「我想我说过了……哦，忘了那句话吧！你想要什么？」

original: I hope to share in your wisdom. May I stay?
translation: 我想要分享你的智慧。可以让我留下来么？

original: The hermit considers your request.
translation: 隐士考虑你的请求。

original: After much badgering, the old man finally relents and permits you to stay for a few days. You observe him carefully and learn as much as you can. In the end, his "wisdom" seems limited to an endless stream of platitudes and maxims. You have memorized many, and at least they will make you seem more learned in the eyes of others.
translation: 在不断地纠缠之后，这个老人终于改变了主意，允许你留在那里几天。你仔细的观察他，尽你最大的努力去学习。最后，他的「智慧」看起来只局限在不断地说着陈词滥调和格言。你记住了许多，它们至少可以让你在其他人的眼里看起来富有学识。

original: "Semper ubi sub ubi ubique."
translation: 「注意卫生，防止皮疹。」

original: If you want to improve your skill at diplomacy, you need to become a confident public speaker. Swaying the hearts and minds of men with simple words is not an easy thing, but you have started practising in front of a mirror. Things can only improve.
translation: 如果你想提升你的外交能力，你需要变成一个自信的公共场合演说者。用简单的词句操纵人的思想和意志不是一件简单的事情，但是你已经开始在镜子前锻炼。只有练习才能提高。

original: You talking to me?
translation: 你在和我说话么？

original: Your hard work practising public speaking in front of a mirror has paid off! You now feel much more confident when addressing others, and your skill at the art of diplomacy has likewise improved.
translation: 你在镜子前锻炼在公共场合演说的努力得到了回报！你现在同别人讲话的时候更有自信，而且你的外交技能也同样得到了提高。

original: Countrymen, lend me your ears!
translation: 国民们，请听我讲话！

original: You are drawn to a large cheerful crowd standing in front of a tall building in [Root.Location.GetName]. It seems they have gathered to watch the antics of a man who has climbed onto the building's roof. The despairing man, tired of the hardships of life, is threatening to jump and several of the onlookers are goading him on.
translation: 你被站在[Root.Location.GetName]的一座高层建筑前喝彩的人群吸引住了。他们似乎是在围观爬到这座建筑楼顶上的一个男人。这个绝望的男人厌倦了生活的艰辛，威胁说要跳下去，几个旁观者正在劝说他。

original: Don't do it!
translation: 别这样！

original: I have no time for this.
translation: 我没时间管这种闲事。

original: You rush forward to stop the suicide.
translation: 你冲向前去阻止这场自杀。

original: You hurry inside the building and join the desperate man on the roof. "No! Stay away!" he cries when he sees you. You slowly climb out on the ledge next to him. "I just want to talk," you say as you edge closer.
translation: 你冲进这座建筑，跑到楼顶上。「不！离我远点！」他一看见你就开始大喊大叫。你缓慢的爬上房顶的凸出部靠近他。「我只想和你谈谈，」你边说边靠近他。

original: Grab the man.
translation: 抓住这个男人。

original: Talk to the man.
translation: 同这个男人谈话。

original: You make an attempt to grab the man.
translation: 你试图抓住这个男人。

original: You quickly reach out and manage to grab the man's wrist before he has a chance to jump. "Let me go, you cretin!" he screams. "I don't care who you are, you have no right to stop me from departing this wretched world!" Far below, you notice that some peasants have gathered a haystack to cushion the fall.
translation: 你快速的伸出手想要在这个男人有机会跳下之前抓住他的手腕。「让我去死，你这个白痴！」他大喊着，「我不管你是谁，你没有权利阻止我离开这个悲惨的世界！」你注意到一些农夫在楼下堆了一个干草堆来缓冲下坠的力量。

original: Jump with the man.
translation: 同这个男人一起跳下。

original: Pull the man inside.
translation: 把这个男人拉回来。

original: You leap off the edge together with the man, aiming for the haystack.
translation: 你同这个男人一起跳下，瞄准干草堆。

original: A glint of madness flashes in your eyes and you smile at the man. "Do you really want to jump? Fine! Then we jump!" The man gapes at you, dumbfounded. "You... you're insane!" he gasps. Before the man can change his mind, you leap off the building and pull him with you.
translation: 你的眼中闪过一丝疯狂，你对这个男人微微一笑。「你真想跳下去么？很好！那么我们一起跳吧！」他惊呆了，目瞪口呆的看着你。「你……你是个疯子！」他气喘吁吁的说。在他改变他的想法之前，你拉着他一起跳下屋顶。

original: Look out below!
translation: 注意下面！

original: The ground rushes towards you.
translation: 大地向你冲过来。

original: You land safely together in the haystack. "Let's go again!" you exclaim as you brush the hay off your clothes. The shocked suicidal man pulls his arm away from you, and stumbles towards the crowd. "Get away from me! Help! That [Root.GetManWoman] tried to kill me, [Root.GetSheHe]'s insane!" As you walk away, you feel your grasp of diplomacy has improved.
translation: 你们安全的在干草堆上着陆。「让我们再来一次！」你边拍掉身上的草秸边说道。那个吓坏了的想要自杀的人把他的胳膊从你的手里拽了出来，他结巴着对人群说：「离我远点！救命！那个[Root.GetManWoman]想要谋杀我，[Root.GetSheHe]是个疯子！」当你离开的时候，你感到你对于外交技能的掌握得到了提高。

original: Mission accomplished.
translation: 任务完成。

original: You pull the man safely away from the roof's edge.
translation: 你把这个男人拽到了安全的地方。

original: Mustering all your strength, you forcefully pull the man back to safety where he can be subdued by members of the city guard. He curses your name as he is dragged off to the dungeons - trying to take one's life is a sin, after all. You have learned the valuable lesson that sometimes actions speak louder than words.
translation: 你用尽你所有的力量，费劲把这个男人拉回安全的地方，他被城市卫兵逮捕。他被带到地牢的时候咒骂着你的名字——毕竟试图自杀是一项罪行。你学到了重要的一课，有的时候行动比言语更加有力。

original: This applies to many situations.
translation: 这适用于许多情况。

original: dissuading the man from leaping to his death.
translation: 说服这个男人放弃跳楼自杀。

original: You speak gently with the distressed man, as if addressing a child. While keeping a safe distance so as not to alarm him, you lecture him at length about the wonders of life. You follow this with several long-winded anecdotes from your own life, including important moral lessons at the end. The man jumps.
translation: 你轻声的同这个痛苦的人讲话，就像同儿童讲话一样。在保持安全的不引起他警惕的距离的同时，你向他详细地讲述了生命的神奇。接下来你又讲了几件冗长的发生在你自己的生活中的轶事，最后又加上了重要的道德说教。这个男人跳了下去。

original: Well, at least I have learned what works and what doesn't...
translation: 好吧，至少我学到了什么可以奏效，什么不能奏效……

original: failing to prevent the suicide.
translation: 阻止自杀失败。

original: You speak gently with the man, addressing him as an equal and a friend. As you talk, you carefully guide the conversation and subtly make him realize the folly of ending his life. To the crowd's dismay, he agrees to come down with you.
translation: 你轻声的同这个男人讲话，就像同一个同辈人、朋友说话一样。在你的谈话中，你小心的引导着你的话题，并且巧妙地让他认识到结束自己生命的愚蠢。他同意和你一起走下来，这让围观者大失所望。

original: I too have learned from this.
translation: 我也在其中学到了很多。

original: Improve Intrigue
translation: 提升阴谋能力

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Intrigue, since it is poor (lower than §Y8§!).
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要提高[This.GetHerHis]阴谋能力，因为它少得可怜（低于 §Y8§!）。

original: You look for some other way to improve your intrigue.
translation: 你寻求其他提升阴谋能力的途径。

original: A local dignitary is visiting together with his pretty young wife. She wears a shining necklace, apparently some kind of priceless family heirloom. While he prattles on, your mind begins to wander. Suppose the bauble was to disappear? This could prove an excellent opportunity to better your skill at intrigue.
translation: 一名本地的权贵和他的年轻美丽的妻子一同到访。她戴着闪闪发光的项链，很明显那是件无价的传家宝。在他说着无聊的话的时候，你开始走神。如果让这个小玩意消失会怎么样？这是一个很好的提升你的阴谋能力的机会。

original: Stage the theft of the necklace.
translation: 发动偷窃项链行动。

original: No, it would be too cruel.
translation: 不，这太残忍了。

original: You wait for the sun to set.
translation: 你等着太阳落山。

original: As night falls, you sneak into the guest room and carefully remove the heirloom from the neck of the dignitary's sleeping wife. She stirs slightly in her sleep, but does not wake. Now that you have the necklace, a worthless gewgaw, you need to decide where to plant it. Who shall take the blame?
translation: 当夜幕降临，你潜入客房，小心的从那个权贵的熟睡的妻子脖子上把项链摘走。她在睡梦中轻轻的翻了个身，但是没有醒过来。现在你得到了这条项链，一个无价的小玩意，你需要做出决定把它放在哪里。嫁祸给谁好呢？

original: Magda, the cook's overweight wife.
translation: 玛格达，厨子的胖老婆。

original: Meldrick, local dung gatherer and dogsbody.
translation: 梅尔德里克，当地的拾粪工和杂役。

original: Wafaa, the cook's overweight wife.
translation: 瓦法，厨子的胖老婆。

original: Ba'ah al-Drik, local dung gatherer and dogsbody.
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克，当地的拾粪工和杂役。

original: The cook's wife will take the fall.
translation: 嫁祸给厨子的老婆。

original: You stealthfully place the necklace in the kitchen, where the cook's wife is sure to find it. Perhaps the poor woman will think it a gift from her husband... or a particularly generous pixie. With your work done, you retire for the night to see what will happen.
translation: 你偷偷地把项链放到厨房里厨子的老婆肯定能够找到的地方。也许这个可怜的女人会认为这是她的丈夫给她的礼物……或者是慷慨的小精灵送她的礼物。当你做完这件事情之后，你隐身于夜色中来观察会发生些什么。

original: This will be interesting.
translation: 这将会十分有趣。

original: Morning arrives...
translation: 天亮了……

original: The loud wailing coming from the guest room informs you that your little theft has been discovered. The dignitary and his wife are both unconsolable, and their grief over the missing necklace knows no bounds. Before they leave, you offer them a meal in the dining room.
translation: 客房传来的巨大哀号声表明你的偷窃行为已经被发现了。这名权贵和他的妻子对于项链被盗十分悲痛，不接受任何安慰。在他们离开之前，你请他们到餐厅吃一顿饭。

original: Magda, bring us some soup, please.
translation: 玛格达，请给我们上点汤。

original: Wafaa, bring us some soup, please.
translation: 瓦法，请给我们上点汤。

original: Soup is served by the cook's wife.
translation: 厨子的老婆把汤端了上来。

original: The cook's wife serves the soup while the dignitary describes, in detail, how the necklace has passed from generation to generation in his family. Suddenly his wife emits a shrill cry and points at the massive wrist of the cook's wife. She is wearing the missing necklace as a bracelet!
translation: 在厨子的老婆端汤上来的时候，那名权贵正在详细的描述那条项链是怎样在他的家族中一代又一代的传下来的。突然他的妻子尖叫一声，用手指向厨子老婆的粗壮手腕。她正把丢失的项链当手镯带着！

original: Guards, seize her!
translation: 卫兵，抓住她！

original: Your scheme is complete.
translation: 你的谋划得逞了。

original: After the necklace has been returned, the affronted dignitary and his wife soon depart. The cook's wife will have to endure a brief spell in the dungeons, but for a good cause - you have learned some valuable lessons in the art of manipulating events to your liking. Your skill at intrigue has increased.
translation: 在找回了项链之后，感到被冒犯了的权贵和他的妻子很快就离开了。厨子的老婆不得不在地牢里忍受一段时间，但是这都是由于一个好的原因——你学到了关于如何操纵事情，使其按照你的意愿进行的艺术的重要一课。你的阴谋能力得到了提升。

original: All's well that ends well.
translation: 结果好就好。

original: You suddenly wake up in cold sweat. The cook's wife! You had her imprisoned for the supposed theft of a necklace all those years ago... but you forgot to let her out!
translation: 你突然浑身冷汗的惊醒。厨子的妻子！你多年以前因为所谓的盗窃项链罪把她关在地牢里……但是你忘了把她放出来！

original: M-Magda! Quick, to the dungeons!
translation: 玛-玛格达！快点，去地牢！

original: W-Wafaa! Quick, to the dungeons!
translation: 瓦-瓦法！快点，去地牢！

original: You are too late. The jailor explains that she passed away in a dark corner of her cell several years ago from the plague. Her remains were dumped together with the countless other thieves and cutthroats who perished in the same epidemic. This might explain why you caught your cook spitting in your stew the other day.
translation: 你来得太晚了。狱卒告诉你她已经在几年以前病死在她的牢房里的一个阴暗角落。她的遗骸和无数其他的死于同一场瘟疫的盗窃犯和杀人犯堆在一起。这也许可以解释为什么你有一天抓到你的厨子往你的饭菜里吐口水。

original: Well, there's not much I can do about it now, is there?
translation: 好吧，现在我对这件事情什么都做不了，不是么？

original: The jailor leads you to an especially dark and damp corner of the dungeon. He unlocks a rusty door to reveal an extremely thin and famished old woman. She looks up at you with frightened eyes and only then do you recognize her as the cook's formerly overweight wife.
translation: 狱卒把你带到地牢里的一个非常阴暗潮湿的角落。他打开一扇生锈的门，里面有一个瘦骨嶙峋的老女人。她用她惊恐的双眼仰视着你，直到这时你才终于认出她是厨子的前任胖老婆。

original: Why, Magda! You've... lost weight.
translation: 为什么，玛格达！你……瘦了这么多。

original: The dung gatherer will take the fall.
translation: 嫁祸给拾粪工。

original: Disguised by a simple cowl, you present the necklace to your dung gathering servant, claiming it is a gift from a secret admirer. He is delighted, saying it will go well with the dirty rags he wears as clothes. With your work done, you retire for the night to see what will happen.
translation: 在一件简单的带帽子的修士服的掩饰下，你把这条项链带给你的拾粪工，告诉他这是一个神秘的仰慕者给他的礼物。他非常高兴，说这条项链和他又脏又破的衣服十分般配。在做完这件事情之后，你隐身于夜色中来观察会发生些什么。

original: This will be interesting.
translation: 这将会十分有趣。

original: The loud wailing coming from the guest room informs you that your little theft has been discovered. The dignitary and his wife are both unconsolable, and their grief over the missing necklace knows no bounds. As they prepare to leave your household, you call on your servant to bring their luggage.
translation: 客房传来的巨大哀号声表明你的偷窃行为已经被发现了。这名权贵和他的妻子对于项链被盗十分悲痛，不接受任何安慰。在他们准备离开的时候，你叫你的仆人把他们的行李带过来。

original: Meldrick, bring down their belongings!
translation: 梅尔德里克，把他们的行李搬下来！

original: Ba'ah al-Drik, bring down their belongings!
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克，把他们的行李搬下来！

original: Your servant gathers up their luggage.
translation: 你的仆人把他们的行李聚在一起。

original: Your servant dumps the luggage in front of the dignitary's carriage, but as he turns to leave, the dignitary's wife emits a shrill cry. She points at the shining heirloom around the servant's filthy neck. He gives her a toothless smile. "D'you like it, m'lady? 'Tis from a secret admirer, it is."
translation: 你的仆人把行李对方在这位权贵的马车之前，但是当他转身准备离开的时候，这位权贵的妻子发出一声尖叫。她指着这个仆人的脏脖子上的闪闪发光的传家宝。他还给她一个不露齿的微笑∶「你喜欢它么，夫人这是我的一个神秘的仰慕者送给我的。」

original: Guards, seize him!
translation: 卫兵，抓住他！

original: After the necklace has been returned, the affronted dignitary and his wife soon depart. Your dung gathering servant will have to endure a brief spell in the dungeons, but for a good cause - you have learned some valuable lessons in the art of manipulating events to your liking. Your skill at intrigue has increased.
translation: 在找回了项链之后，感到被冒犯了的权贵和他的妻子很快就离开了。你的拾粪工不得不在地牢里忍受一段时间，但是这都是由于一个好的原因——你学到了关于如何操纵事情，使其按照你的意愿进行的艺术的重要一课。你的阴谋能力得到了提升。

original: All's well that ends well.
translation: 结果好就好。

original: You suddenly wake up in cold sweat. The dung gatherer! You had him imprisoned for the supposed theft of a necklace all those years ago... but you forgot to let him out!
translation: 你突然浑身冷汗的惊醒。拾粪工！你多年以前以为所谓的盗窃项链罪把他关在地牢里……但是你忘了把他放出来！

original: M-Meldrick! Quick, to the dungeons!
translation: 梅-梅尔德里克！快点，去地牢！

original: Ba'ah al-Drik! Quick, to the dungeons!
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克！快，去地牢！

original: You are too late. The jailor explains that he passed away in a dark corner of his cell several years ago from the plague. His remains were dumped together with the countless other thieves and cutthroats who perished in the same epidemic. You had been wondering about all that ungathered dung laying about.
translation: 你来得太晚了。狱卒告诉你她已经在几年以前病死在他的牢房里的一个阴暗角落。他的遗骸和无数其他的死于同一场瘟疫的盗窃犯和杀人犯堆在一起。你想起外面那些没有收集起来的粪便。

original: Well, there's not much I can do about it now, is there?
translation: 好吧，现在我对这件事情什么都做不了，不是么？

original: The jailor leads you to an especially dark and damp corner of the dungeon. He unlocks a rusty door to reveal a disgusting ghoul. An unholy smell washes over you as you look at the tiny, clammy, hairy creature that lies before you. Your formerly dung gathering servant looks up at you with a toothless smile. "M'lord?"
translation: 狱卒把你带到地牢里的一个非常阴暗潮湿的角落。他打开一扇生锈的门，里面有一个令人作呕的食尸鬼。一股恶臭扑面而来，你看见一个瘦弱，冰冷，浑身毛发的生物躺在你的面前。你的前任拾粪工仰视着你，向你不露齿地微笑。「大人？」

original: Meldrick? On second thought, jailor, close that door...
translation: 梅尔德里克？你转念一想，狱卒，把门关上……

original: Ba'ah al-Drik? On second thought, jailor, close that door...
translation: 巴阿赫·德里克？你转念一想，狱卒，把门关上……

original: You hurry to the dungeons...
translation: 你急忙赶到地牢……

original: To improve your stewardship and better learn how to administrate a realm, it strikes you that it might be a good idea to conduct a survey of the land. Trustworthy men would have to be sent out to every corner of your domains and record their findings. This information will then be collected into a single, great tome.
translation: 为了提高你的管理能力并且学会如何更好地治理一个王国，你突然想到在国内进行一项调查是一个好主意。值得信赖的人会被派到国内的各个角落记录他们的发现。这些信息将会收进一部单卷的伟大著作。

original: Let us write this tome of judgment!
translation: 让我们写作这部帮助判断国内准确情况的巨著！

original: No, I fear it would be a waste of time.
translation: 不，我怕这是浪费时间。

original: The men are dispatched to survey the land.
translation: 派出人调查全国。

original: The men you sent out to survey the land have returned. You now have a precise count of the households, down to how many cows they own. This was a wise initiative, and your stewardship ability has increased.
translation: 为了调查全国派出的人员已经返回了。你现在有了准确的户口数据，详细到每家有多少头奶牛。这是一项睿智的倡议，你的管理能力得到了提升。

original: The [Root.GetTitle] sees all!
translation: [Root.GetTitle]无所不知！

original: It dawns on you one day that there is plenty of intrigue happening right under your nose. Your servants, from the kitchen maids to the stable boys, share juicy gossip with each other on a daily basis. If you want to improve at this twisted game of manipulation and deceit, then perhaps you ought to dive in and join the prattle!
translation: 有一天你突然发现在你的眼皮底下有许多密谋正在进行。你的仆人们，从厨娘到马夫，每天都彼此分享着有趣的流言。如果你想提高你在这项关于操纵和欺骗的扭曲的游戏上的能力，那么也许你就应当加入到这种无聊的空谈中！

original: Said and done!
translation: 说做就做！

original: Never!
translation: 绝不！

original: You join the servants' gossip sessions.
translation: 你加入了仆人们的八卦聊天。

original: Taking part in the gossip sessions of your servants has proved an enlightening experience. Not only have you learned of new ways to obtain sensitive information, but also that one of the milk maids is secretly carrying the blacksmith's unborn child!
translation: 加入你的仆人们的八卦聊天这一经历带给你很大启发。你不仅学到了获得敏感信息的途径，而且还知道了挤奶女工正怀着铁匠的孩子这一秘密！

original: Oh, the scandal!
translation: 哦，绯闻！

original: By chance, you have learned that an old tailor in [Root.Location.GetName] once worked as spymaster for a local nobleman many years ago. The stories of his deeds and exploits are the stuff of legends. If even half of it is true, then this man could surely teach you a thing or two about intrigue.
translation: 偶然地，你知道了在[Root.Location.GetName]的一个老裁缝曾经在许多年前当过本地的一位贵族的间谍总管。关于他的功绩的故事成为了传奇的素材。如果这些故事有一半是真的，那么这个人肯定可以教给你一些阴谋的知识。

original: I will seek him out!
translation: 我会去找他！

original: No, this man sounds dangerous.
translation: 不，这个人听上去很危险的样子。

original: You set time aside to pay this "tailor" a visit.
translation: 你腾出时间去拜访这个「裁缝」。

original: As you visit the tailor in his modest shop, the harmless-looking little man feigns ignorance and for a moment you wonder if you have the wrong person. He kindly turns to fetch you some tea, but then suddenly, before you can react, he is standing behind you with a knife at your throat. "Who sent you?" he hisses into your ear.
translation: 在你到裁缝的小店拜访他的时候，这个满脸无害状的小个子假装无辜，有一瞬间你想是不是找错人了。他转身去给你拿些茶，但是突然，在你反应过来之前，他已经站在你的背后拿刀指着你的喉咙。「谁派你来的？」他在你的耳边嘶声说道。

original: N-no one! I only wish to learn from you!
translation: 没、没人！我只是想要向你学习！

original: The old man does not look convinced.
translation: 这个老人看上去没有听信你的话。

original: After questioning you, the old man is finally satisfied that you're not there to kill him. He grudgingly agrees to teach you some of his tricks, if you promise to keep the secret of his past to yourself.
translation: 在询问你之后，这个老人终于感到满意，确认你不是来杀他的。他不情愿地同意教给你他的技巧，如果你发誓保守关于他过去经历的秘密。

original: Agreed!
translation: 同意！

original: You begin your training.
translation: 你开始了你的训练，

original: You have studied long and hard under the old spymaster in your sparetime, and he has taught you much about the game of cloak and dagger. Your intrigue has improved!
translation: 你在你的闲暇时间，在这个年老的间谍总管的教授下进行了漫长艰苦的学习，他教会了你许多关于伪装和短剑的技巧，你的阴谋能力得到了提升！

original: I do not fear the dark.
translation: 我不惧怕黑暗，

original: Lower Decadence
translation: 降低腐化度

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to lower the decadence of [This.GetHerHis] dynasty, as its value is above 60.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要降低[This.GetHerHis]家族的腐化度，因为它的数值超过了 60。

original: You look for some other way to lower your dynasty's decadence.
translation: 你寻求其他途径降低你的家族的腐化度。

original: Your dynasty has become renowned for its decadence and the common folk view you with disdain. As a gesture to show them that you remember your ancient roots, perhaps you should leave the luxuries of your palace behind for a few days and spend some time with the desert nomads?
translation: 你的家族已经以其腐化而变得知名，普通民众用轻蔑的眼光看待你。为了告诉他们你仍然记得先祖的荣光，也许你应该把你在宫殿里的奢侈生活暂时放到一边，并和沙漠中的游牧部落一起过上几天？

original: Yes... for a few days.
translation: 好吧……就凑活几天。

original: No, I refuse to live in filth and squalor!
translation: 不，我拒绝和这些肮脏的垃圾住在一起！

original: You spend some time with the Berbers.
translation: 你和柏柏尔人住了一段时间。

original: You spend a few days in the deep desert with a Berber tribe. These are poor and simple folk, but their knowledge of the land and how to live off it impresses you. They treat you as one of their own, and when you finally return to your palace with your face and robe caked in dust, you have a newfound respect for these warriors.
translation: 你在沙漠深处和柏柏人部落一起住了几天。这些人贫穷而简朴，但是他们关于陆地和如何生活的知识给你留下了深刻的印象。他们把你当作自己人看待，在你最后满脸满身沾满沙尘地返回你的宫殿的时候，你对这些战士有了新的敬意。

original: Time well spent.
translation: 愉快的时光。

original: A group of vicious highwaymen have been preying on travellers in [Root.Location.GetName]. Your scouts have discovered the location of their camp, but if you march an army towards them they will disperse long before it arrives. A small band of hand-picked warriors personally led by you might stand a better chance of capturing their leader.
translation: 一伙邪恶的强盗一直以来盘踞在[Root.Location.GetName]抢劫旅行者。你的斥候发现了他们老巢的位置，但是如果你派出一支军队到那里，他们会在军队到达前四散逃跑。一小批你亲自挑选并率领的战士也许有更大的机会抓住他们的首领。

original: Yes, I will show them!
translation: 是的，我会展示给他们看的！

original: I will not risk my neck to fight bandits!
translation: 我不会为了盗贼而拿我的生命去冒险！

original: Alas, I am too old for such heroics...
translation: 哎呀，这样的英雄行为不适合我这个老人……

original: You prepare to strike at the bandits.
translation: 你为突袭匪徒做准备。

original: You select twelve of the bravest and most capable men from your personal levies. Together you set off towards the bandit camp and approach it under the cover of darkness. Their leader, a big one-eyed brute of a man, sits at a campfire with his lieutenants and is dividing up the spoils of their latest raid.
translation: 你从你的军队中选出了十二名最勇敢最有能力的战士。你和他们一起向着匪徒的老巢出发，并在夜幕的掩饰下接近了它。他们的首领，一个残忍的独眼巨汉，正和他手下的头领们围坐在篝火边上分配他们上次打劫到的赃物。

original: Charge!!!
This was a bad idea. Let's go home.
translation: 这是一个坏主意，我们还是回家吧。

original: The assault against the bandit's camp begins.
translation: 对匪徒巢穴的突袭开始了。

original: Your men storm the bandit camp and cut down the startled highwaymen in droves. Their leader proves to be a capable fighter, and two of your men have their skulls cleaved by his massive axe. As the wild melee continues on all sides, you and the leader are seperated from the others and face each other in single combat.
translation: 你的士兵们像风暴一样扫过匪徒的营地，把震惊的歹徒们像赶羊一样砍倒在地。他们的首领证明了他是一个强力的战士，他的大斧劈开了两个你的人的脑壳。在到处都在混战的时候，你和那个首领都被隔在远离同伴的地方，你们二人在一场单对单的战斗中面对面。

original: L-Let's not be hasty! We can talk this over!
translation: 先-先不要着急！我们可以商量商量！

original: My, I can't wait to see your head impaled on a spear.
translation: 来吧，我迫不及待的想看到你的脑袋被插在长矛上。

original: It is a good day to die.
translation: 这是迎接死亡的一个好日子。

original: You face off with the bandit leader.
translation: 你和匪徒的首领正面对抗。

original: The fight was hard and the bandit leader's axe came close to splitting your head more than once. In the end, you managed to dig your blade into his unprotected flank and the brute was felled. The rest of the bandits were killed or rounded up by your men, and they will plague travellers no longer.
translation: 战斗很艰苦，匪徒首领的斧子有好几次都差点把你的头劈开。最终你成功的把你的剑插入他防备不严的侧肋，这头野兽终于倒下了。剩下的匪徒不是被杀就是被你的人包围，他们再也没机会袭击旅行者了。

original: A job well done!
translation: 干得好！

original: Help me with this head...
translation: 帮我拿着这个首级……

original: There is a legend amongst the peasant folk of a two-headed albino dromedary stalking the desert sands after night has fallen. Their name for the beast is "Adh-Dhi'ban" - The Two Jackals. Organising a hunt for this unholy creature and mounting its two heads on your wall would make your dynasty seem less decadent.
translation: 在平民百姓中流传着一个传说：当夜幕降临时，会有一头长着两个脑袋的白色骆驼在沙漠中行走。他们给这头怪兽起的名字叫作「Adh-Dhi'ban」——双头豺狼。组织一场对于这只邪恶的生物的狩猎，并把它的两个头挂在你的墙上，这可以让你的家族看起来少一点腐化。

original: A worthy quest. Let us slay this affront to nature.
translation: 一次有价值的狩猎。让我们杀死这头反自然的畜生。

original: I have not the stomach to face such a creature.
translation: 我没有胃口去整天面对这样一只生物。

original: You organize a hunt.
translation: 你组织起一场狩猎。

original: You set out into the desert together with a local guide. He warns you that a mere gaze from the beast's four eyes has been enough to drive men mad in the past. You tell him not to worry, for you intend to pluck the creature's eyes from out of their sockets, and then boil and eat them. The guide looks queasy.
translation: 你带着一位本地的向导出发进入沙漠。他警告你曾经有人仅仅看了那个怪兽的四个眼睛一眼就疯掉了。你告诉他不要担心，因为你打算把这头怪兽的眼珠从它的眼窝中挖出来，然后把它们煮熟了吃。这个向导看上去快要吐了。

original: Let us not dally. Forward!
translation: 让我们玩玩吧。前进！

original: You begin your search for this legendary creature.
translation: 你开始狩猎这头传说中的生物。

original: The search proves fruitless. At one point you thought you had found an even more twisted creature. Although not albino, this dromedary possessed not only two heads, but two bodies as well! Your guide then pointed out that it was two dromedaries standing next to each other.
translation: 狩猎行动毫无收获。在一个地方你找到了一个更为古怪的生物。虽然不是白色的，这头骆驼不仅有两个脑袋，还有两个身体！这时，你的向导指出这是两头骆驼并排站在一起。

original: We waste time! That beast must be here somewhere!
translation: 我们在浪费时间！那头野兽一定就在什么地方！

original: You continue the search.
translation: 你继续狩猎行动。

original: The beast does not exist. Days of search has proven as much. You briefly contemplate taking the heads of two ordinary dromedaries and painting them white, but in the end decide it would be too much work. You and your guide head for home.
translation: 那头怪兽并不存在。几天的搜寻已经切实的证明了这点。你开始想带回去两个普通骆驼的脑袋，然后把它们染成白色，但是最后决定这太费事了。你和你的向导调头回家。

original: This was an unproductive trip...
translation: 这是一个虚度光阴的旅程……

original: You return home in disgrace.
translation: 你脸上无光地回到了家。

original: To your surprise, when you and your guide return you are both hailed as heroes by the populace. They claim your courageous hunt drove the evil Adh-Dhi'ban away from the mortal realm for good. Men and women may now tread safely in the desert at night.
translation: 令你吃惊的是，当你和你的向导返回的时候，你们两个人都被民众当作英雄来歌颂。他们声称你们的勇敢行为把恶魔 Adh-Dhi'ban 从人类社会赶走。不论男女现在都可以安全的在夜里的沙漠行走。

original: Well... of course!
translation: 好吧……当然！

original: You have mastered the art of desert warfare. This difficult terrain provides many obstacles for an army to overcome, but also great opportunities for those who know where to look for them. Your forces will always fight better in the desert.
translation: 你已经掌握了沙漠作战的技巧。这一困难的的地形给军队带来了许多困难，但是也给知道如何应对它的人很大机会。你的军队将会在沙漠战中更有优势。

original: The sands will swallow my foes.
translation: 沙子会吞没我的敌人。

original: Forests and hills have become your preferred battleground. Using them to your benefit, you are better able to safely close the distance to your opponents or keep your forces away as the situation dictates. Your troops will gain an important edge in this terrain.
translation: 森林和山岭已经成了你更喜欢的战斗场所。利用这些优势，你可以更加安全的缩短和你的敌人的距离，或者根据情况保持距离。你的军队在这种地形下将会获得重要的优势。

original: The land shall be my greatest ally.
translation: 大地是我最好的盟友。

original: You no longer see fighting in difficult mountainous terrain as a disadvantage, but as an opportunity. The movement of your army is easier to obscure, and your opponents can be funneled towards battlegrounds of your chosing. If battle is joined in the mountains, your army gains an advantage.
translation: 你不再把在困难的山地地形上战斗视为不利条件，而是看作一个机会。可以更容易地掩饰你的军队的移动，并且可以迫使你的敌人进入你选定的战场。如果战斗是在山地地形上进行的，你的军队将会获得优势。

original: The very mountains shall be my shield.
translation: 连山地都成了我的护盾。

original: Large, open battlefields are where you fight best. When fighting in plains or on farmland, you are better able to array your army for battle and maneuver it to gain an advantage. Forces under your command will perform better in this terrain.
translation: 巨大开阔的战场是你的最爱。当在平原或者农田上战斗的时候，你可以更好的布置你的军队进入战斗，并且巧妙地移动来获得优势。在你指挥下的军队将会在这种地形下表现更佳。

original: If caught in the open, my foes shall feel my wrath.
translation: 如果碰到开阔的战场，我的敌人将会感受到我的怒火。

original: Your experience in matters of war has increased and there are many things you will do differently in future battles. What will you focus on?
translation: 你在战争事务上的经验增加了，在今后的战斗中你可以有很多事情做得更好。你将要专注于哪项？

original: Master Rough Terrain.
translation: 精通崎岖地形。

original: Master Flat Terrain.
translation: 精通平坦地形。

original: Master Mountain Terrain.
translation: 精通山地地形。

original: Master Desert Terrain.
translation: 精通沙漠地形。

original: Focus on Cavalry.
translation: 专注于骑兵。

original: Focus on Light Foot.
translation: 专注于轻步兵。

original: Focus on Heavy Infantry.
translation: 专注于重步兵。

original: Focus on the Attack.
translation: 专注于攻击。

original: Focus on the Defense.
translation: 专注于防御。

original: Learn to Inspire.
translation: 学习鼓舞士气。

original: Experiment with tactics.
translation: 专注于佯攻战术。

original: Focus on the Flank.
translation: 专注于侧翼。

original: Study Organization.
translation: 学习组织管理。

original: Fight with Religious Fervour.
translation: 在宗教狂热下战斗。

original: Never Surrender.
translation: 绝不投降。

original: Introduced Insane Law
translation: 颁行疯狂法案

original: For the good of all, you and everyone else in the realm ignore the existence of this law.
translation: 为了大家的利益，你和王国中的所有人无视这项法律的存在。

original: You have decided to introduce a new law to the good people of the realm, as is your right as their ruler. Now you just have to decide on its contents...
translation: 你已经决定为所有王国中的良民引入一项新的法案，这是你做为他们统治者的权利。现在你只需要决定法案的具体内容……

original: The Turnip Act.
translation: 萝卜法案。

original: The Pants Act.
translation: 裤子法案。
