original: The Hole in the Wall Act.
translation: 墙洞法案。

original: The Cessation of Violence Act.
translation: 停止暴力法案。

original: You give the order to implement the Turnip Act.
translation: 你下令实行萝卜法案。

original: You give the order to implement the Pants Act.
translation: 你下令实行裤子法案。

original: You give the order to implement the Hole in the Wall Act.
translation: 你下令实行墙洞法案。

original: You give the order to implement the Cessation of Violence Act.
translation: 你下令实行停止暴力法案。

original: The Turnip Act
translation: 萝卜法案

original:
Your slightly eccentric liege has proclaimed a new law that is to be upheld throughout the realm. It reads:

"Whereas the turnip represents the very best qualities to be found in society, and: whereas it is of fine texture, particularly when boiled, and has been proven to remedy all ailments known to Man when consumed:

Therefore I, [From.GetTitledName], decree that the turnip shall henceforth be used as currency throughout the realm, taking the place of gold, silver or any other precious metal. These shall instead be turned over to the Crown for immediate disposal."
translation:
你们的有点古怪的领主颁布了一项新的法律，要在全国实行。上面写着：

「有鉴于萝卜代表着社会上所能找到的最好的品质，且：有鉴于萝卜有着精细的纹路，尤其是在煮熟的时候，并且服用萝卜已被证明可以治疗任何已知的人类疾病∶

因此，我，[From.GetTitledName]，宣布萝卜从此将会作为硬通货在整个王国中使用，来取代金、银或者任何其他贵金属的地位。这些贵金属应该立即上交给国王来进行处理。」

original: What the...
translation: 什么鬼……

original: The Pants Act
translation: 裤子法案

original:
Your slightly eccentric liege has proclaimed a new law that is to be upheld throughout the realm. It reads:

"Whereas pants constrict not only the lower limbs and reproductive organs, but also the human soul, and: whereas pants are known to be an affront to all forms of life but Man:

Therefore I, [From.GetTitledName], command that the use of pants be outlawed throughout the realm under penalty of death. All existing variants of this garment are to be immediately burned, and the ashes distributed evenly over the graves of our forefathers."
translation:
你们的有点古怪的领主颁布了一项新的法律，要在全国实行。上面写着：

「有鉴于裤子不仅限制了下肢和生殖器官，而且限制了人类的灵魂，且：有鉴于裤子对于除人类以外的所有生命都是一种侮辱：

因此，我，[From.GetTitledName]，下令在全国范围内穿裤子为违法，并且将受到死刑的惩罚。所有已有的各种各样的这种衣服必须立刻烧毁，灰烬将被均匀的洒在我们祖先的陵墓上面。」

original: They will have to pry them from my cold, dead legs...
translation: 他们将不得不把裤子从我的又冷又僵的腿上扒下来……

original: The Hole in the Wall Act
translation: 墙洞法案

original:
Your slightly eccentric liege has proclaimed a new law that is to be upheld throughout the realm. It reads:

"Whereas the positive effects of fresh air is known to all, and: whereas the movement of the wind must not be obstructed by man-made structures:

Therefore I, [From.GetTitledName], decree that all homesteads throughout the realm are to have two holes, each no smaller than a grown peasant standing with arms outstretched, in opposite walls facing each other to allow free passage of the wind. These holes are not to be covered by planks, windows, doors or cattle. If any member of the household is known to exhibit severe flatulence, the holes shall number three and no less."
translation:
你们的有点古怪的领主颁布了一项新的法律，要在全国实行。上面写着：

「有鉴于新鲜空气的积极作用众所周知，且：有鉴于风的流动不应该被人造的建筑阻挡：

因此，我，[From.GetTitledName]，颁布法令规定王国内所有的住宅都必须在墙上留两个洞，每个洞要至少能够容纳一个成年农夫伸直手臂站立其中，两个洞要打在正对的两面墙上以允许风自由穿过。这些洞不允许被木板，窗户，门或者牲口挡住。如果有任何家庭成员患有肠胃气胀，那么洞的数量应该不少于三个。」

original: What?
translation: 啥？

original: The Cessation of Violence Act
translation: 停止暴力法案

original:
Your slightly eccentric liege has proclaimed a new law that is to be upheld throughout the realm. It reads:

"Whereas the children of the realm have become desensitised to violence, and: whereas the general populace seems to have lost all regard for the sanctity of human life:

Therefore I, [From.GetTitledName], decree that all forms of violence directed at other human beings be outlawed, including both capital and corporal punishment as well as the torture of criminals, heathens and foreigners. These vulnerable social groups are instead to be rehabilitated and eventually released back into society as productive citizens."
translation:
你们的有点古怪的领主颁布了一项新的法律，要在全国实行。上面写着：

「有鉴于王国内的儿童们对暴力感到麻木，且：有鉴于普通平民似乎已经失去了对于神圣的人类生命的尊重：

因此，我，[From.GetTitledName]，颁布法令规定所有指向其他人的暴力都是非法的，包括死刑、肉刑以及对于犯人、异教徒和外国人的折磨。这些受害的社会群体将被释放，恢复其社会地位。」

original: Rehabi...? What insanity is this?
translation: 恢复……这是发哪门子的疯？

original:
The new law has been written and couriers are even now distributing it to all of your vassals. You admire your handiwork:

"Whereas the turnip represents the very best qualities to be found in society, and: whereas it is of fine texture, particularly when boiled, and has been proven to remedy all ailments known to Man when consumed:

Therefore I, [Root.GetTitledName], decree that the turnip shall henceforth be used as currency throughout the realm, taking the place of gold, silver or any other precious metal. These shall instead be turned over to the Crown for immediate disposal."
translation:
新法已经制订完成，朝臣们正在把它分发给你的所有的封臣。你对你亲手写的东西感到非常满意：

「有鉴于萝卜代表着社会上所能找到的最好的品质，且：有鉴于萝卜有着精细的纹路，尤其是在煮熟的时候，并且服用萝卜已被证明可以治疗任何已知的人类疾病∶

因此，我，[Root.GetTitledName]，宣布萝卜从此将会作为硬通货在整个王国中使用，来取代金、银或者任何其他贵金属的地位。这些贵金属应该立即上交给国王来进行处理。」

original: This law will bring salvation to the realm.
translation: 这项法律将给整个王国带来救赎。

original:
The new law has been written and couriers are even now distributing it to all of your vassals. You admire your handiwork:

"Whereas pants constrict not only the lower limbs and reproductive organs, but also the human soul, and: whereas pants are known to be an affront to all forms of life but Man:

Therefore I, [From.GetTitledName], command that the use of pants be outlawed throughout the realm under penalty of death. All existing variants of this garment are to be immediately burned, and the ashes distributed evenly over the graves of our forefathers."
translation:
新的法律已经制订完成，并且你的朝臣们已经在把它分发给你的所有的封臣。你对你亲手写的东西感到非常满意：

「有鉴于裤子不仅限制了下肢和生殖器官，而且限制了人类的灵魂，且：有鉴于裤子对于除人类以外的所有生命都是一种侮辱：

因此，我，[From.GetTitledName]，下令在全国范围内穿裤子为违法，并且将受到死刑的惩罚。所有已有的各种各样的这种衣服必须立刻烧毁，灰烬将被均匀的洒在我们祖先的陵墓上面。」

original:
The new law has been written and couriers are even now distributing it to all of your vassals. You admire your handiwork:

"Whereas the positive effects of fresh air is known to all, and: whereas the movement of the wind must not be obstructed by man-made structures:

Therefore I, [From.GetTitledName], decree that all homesteads throughout the realm are to have two holes, each no smaller than a grown peasant standing with arms outstretched, in opposite walls facing each other to allow free passage of the wind. These holes are not to be covered by planks, windows, doors or cattle. If any member of the household is known to exhibit severe flatulence, the holes shall number three and no less."
translation:
新的法律已经制订完成，并且你的朝臣们已经在把它分发给你的所有的封臣。你对你亲手写的东西感到非常满意：

「有鉴于新鲜空气的积极作用众所周知，且：有鉴于风的流动不应该被人造的建筑阻挡：

因此，我，[From.GetTitledName]，颁布法令规定王国内所有的住宅都必须在墙上留两个洞，每个洞要至少能够容纳一个成年农夫伸直手臂站立其中，两个洞要打在正对的两面墙上以允许风自由穿过。这些洞不允许被木板，窗户，门或者牲口挡住。如果有任何家庭成员患有肠胃气胀，那么洞的数量应该不少于三个。」

original:
The new law has been written and couriers are even now distributing it to all of your vassals. You admire your handiwork:

"Whereas the children of the realm have become desensitised to violence, and: whereas the general populace seems to have lost all regard for the sanctity of human life:

Therefore I, [From.GetTitledName], decree that all forms of violence directed at other human beings be outlawed, including both capital and corporal punishment as well as the torture of criminals, heathens and foreigners. These vulnerable social groups are instead to be rehabilitated and eventually released back into society as productive citizens."
translation:
新的法律已经制订完成，并且你的朝臣们已经在把它分发给你的所有的封臣。你对你亲手写的东西感到非常满意：

「有鉴于王国内的儿童们对暴力感到麻木，且：有鉴于普通平民似乎已经失去了对于神圣的人类生命的尊重：

因此，我，[From.GetTitledName]，颁布法令规定所有指向其他人的暴力都是非法的，包括死刑、肉刑以及对于犯人、异教徒和外国人的折磨。这些受害的社会群体将被释放，恢复其社会地位。」

original: You are sitting on the floor of your bedchamber, wearing one of your shoes as a hat, when suddenly a man-sized gopher enters the room. It is dressed as a maid and when you shout in alarm, the rodent squeaks and skitters away in panic. You chase it down the hall but find only a terrified maid cowering on the floor.
translation: 你正坐在你的卧室的地板上，头上戴着一只鞋作为帽子，突然一只像人一样大小的金花鼠闯进了房间。它打扮得像一个侍女，当你大叫发出警报的时候，这只啮齿动物吱吱叫着惊慌的逃跑了。你追着它跑下楼来到大厅里，却只发现一个吓坏了的侍女畏缩在地板上。

original: Where did the gopher go? Did you see?
translation: 那只金花鼠跑到哪里去了？你看见了么？

original: You are hosting a dinner for some local dignitaries when the full moon comes into view in one of the windows. Trembling, you excuse yourself and hurry up the stairs to your bedchamber while stripping off your clothes. You are completely naked when the guards find you crouched on your balcony, howling at the moon.
translation: 当满月照进一扇窗户的时候，你正在举行一顿晚宴招待本地的达官显贵。你浑身颤抖着，说了一声失礼，然后急忙跑上楼到你的卧室，边跑边撕扯你身上的衣服。当卫兵找到你的时候，你正浑身赤裸着蹲伏在你的阳台上，对着月亮嚎叫。

original: AAAAAAAAOOOOOOO!!!!!!
translation: 嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷呜呜呜呜呜呜呜！！！

original: Your horse has always struck you as being of a dependable sort, a quality you feel is sorely lacking in your councillors. Time to shake things up a bit. You will appoint him as your new [Root.GetChancellorName].
translation: 你的马总是向你证明它值得信赖，这是一种你觉得你的内阁成员急需的品质。到了做出改变的时候了。你将要任命它为你的新任[Root.GetChancellorName]。

original: Glitterhoof, I appoint thee as the [Root.GetChancellorName] of the realm.
translation: 闪蹄，我任命你为王国的[Root.GetChancellorName]。

original: Your mad [Root.Liege.GetTitle] has decided, in [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] infinite wisdom, to relieve you of your post as [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName]. Glitterhoof, [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] beloved horse, will be taking your place.
translation: 你疯狂的[Root.Liege.GetTitle]基于[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]无尽的智慧已经决定解除你[Root.Liege.GetChancellorName]的职位。闪蹄，[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]最爱的马，将会接替你的位置。

original: You are forced through the indignity of watching as Glitterhoof is led into the council chambers and appointed [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName].
translation: 你被迫经受这个耻辱，注视着闪蹄被牵进内阁大厅并被任命为[Root.Liege.GetChancellorName]。

original: This time that maniac has gone too far...
translation: 这次这个疯子做得太过分了……

original: Raise Own Local Holding Levies ( §Y$SIZE$§! Troops )\n
translation: 调集当地领地征召兵（§Y$SIZE$§! 部队）\n

original: Raise Own Local Holding Fleets ( §Y$SIZE$§! Ships )\n
translation: 调集当地领地征召舰队（§Y$SIZE$§! 船只）\n

original: Raise Local Liege Levies
translation: 调集当地领主征召兵

original: Raise Local Liege Levy Fleets
translation: 调集当地领主征召舰队

original: Raise the Liege Levy
translation: 调集领主征召兵

original: Raise the Liege Levy Fleet
translation: 调集领主征召舰队

original: of §Y$VASSAL$§! ( §Y$SIZE$§! $TYPE$ )\n
translation: 属于§Y$VASSAL$§!（§Y$SIZE$§! $TYPE$）\n

original: Dismiss the Liege Levy
translation: 解散领主征召兵

original: \nYou cannot create this retinue, your maximum retinue cap has been reached.
translation: \n你不能创建这支近卫军，你已经达到了最大的近卫军数量。

original: \nYou cannot create this retinue, you cannot afford it.
translation: \n你不能创建这支近卫军，你不能负担它的费用。

original: Cost to create: §Y$COST$§!\n
translation: 创建花费：§Y$COST$§!\n

original: Current Retinue cap usage: §Y$SIZE$§!\n
translation: 目前近卫军上限用量：§Y$SIZE$§!\n

original: Retinue Cap: §Y$SIZE$§!\n
translation: 近卫军上限：§Y$SIZE$§!\n

original: Retinue Cap Usage: §Y$SIZE$§!\n
translation: 近卫军上限用量：§Y$SIZE$§!\n

original: Longbow
translation: 英格兰长弓手

original: Schiltron
translation: 苏格兰长枪兵

original: Baltic Warrior
translation: 波罗的战士

original: Horse Archer
translation: 阿尔泰马弓手

original: Knight
translation: 西欧骑士

original: Caballero
translation: 伊比利亚骑手

original: Pike
translation: 意大利长矛手

original: Druzhina
translation: 罗斯伙伴卫队

original: Housecarl
translation: 北日耳曼侍卫

original: Hussar
translation: 匈牙利轻骑兵

original: Camel Warrior
translation: 阿拉伯骆驼武士

original: Cataphract
translation: 铁甲圣骑兵

original: Gallowglass
translation: 外乡勇士

original: Ethiopian Skirmisher
translation: 埃塞俄比亚散兵

original: Free Warrior
translation: 西非自由战士

original: Gusar
translation: 古萨尔

original: Goedendag Militia
translation: 古腾塔克长矛民兵

original: Move capital to §Y$CAPITAL$§!\n
translation: 迁都至§Y$CAPITAL$§!\n

original: Make §Y$CAPITAL$§! the capital of §Y$PROVINCE$§!\n
translation: 把§Y$CAPITAL$§!作为§Y$PROVINCE$§!的首府\n

original: Army Levies
translation: 军队征募

original: Fleet Levies
translation: 舰队征募

original: $WHO$ gets a §Y$RETINUE$§! retinue
translation: $WHO$得到了一个§Y$RETINUE$§!近卫军

original: $WHO$ does not have at least §Y$NEED$§! retinue space
translation: $WHO$没有至少§Y$NEED$§!近卫军空余

original: $WHO$ has at least §Y$NEED$§! retinue space
translation: $WHO$有至少§Y$NEED$§!近卫军空余

original: $TYPE$: §Y$COST$§! ( §Y$EACH$§! for each soldier )\n
translation: $TYPE$：§Y$COST$§!（§Y$EACH$§! 块每名士兵）\n

original: §Y$BONUS$ Retinues
translation: §Y$BONUS$§! 近卫军§!

original: §Y$BONUS$§! Levies
translation: §Y$BONUS$§! 征召兵

original: Technology in §Y$CAPITAL$§!: $BONUS$
translation: §Y$CAPITAL$§!科技奖励：$BONUS$

original: Global Supply Limit
translation: 全球补给限制

original: Reinforcing: §Y$AMOUNT$§! soldiers / month
translation: 增援：§Y$AMOUNT$§! 名士兵/月

original: Reinforcing: §Y$AMOUNT$§! ships / month
translation: 增援：§Y$AMOUNT$§! 艘战船/月

original: This game is running §Y$DLC$§! DLC
translation: 这款游戏现在正在运行 §Y$DLC$§! DLC

original: §YRetinues§!\nThese numbers are the current size of your Retinue and the maintenance you pay for it.
translation: §Y近卫军§!\n这些数字是你目前的近卫军数量以及你为他们支付的维护费。

original: §YArmy Levies§!\nThese numbers are the current size of all raised levies and the maintenance you pay for them.
translation: §Y征召兵§!\n这些数字显示你目前已调集了多少征召兵以及需要支付的维护费用。

original: §YFleet Levies§!\nThese numbers are the current number of raised ships and the maintenance you pay for them.
translation: §Y征召舰队§!\n这些数字显示你目前已调集了多少舰队以及需要支付的维护费用。

original: Your Fleet Levies can be raised from your Demesne holdings and your direct vassals.\nYou pay maintenance for levies from your own holdings, but your vassals will pay for the levies they provide you (which does not make them happy).
translation: 你可以从你的领地以及你的直属封臣那里征召舰队。\n你需要为从你的直属领地调集的征召舰队支付维护费用，但你的封臣将会为他们向你提供的征召舰队支付费用（这会让他们不高兴）。

original: Charge on Undefended Flank
translation: 冲击无防备的侧翼

original: Send your [GetChancellorName] on a diplomatic mission to improve relations with your vassals or the ruler of a county.
translation: 派出你的[GetChancellorName]从事一项外交使命来改善你和你的封臣们或者你和一个国家的统治者的关系。

original: Dispatch your [GetSpymasterName] to discourage vassals from associating with Factions, or to recruit new members for your own. This will also increase the likelihood of uncovering the plots of local nobles.
translation: 派出你的[GetSpymasterName]去打消封臣们与派系联合的念头，或者为你的派系争取更多的支持者。这还会增加发现当地贵族的阴谋的可能性。

original: Vassal Discouraged from Joining Factions
translation: 封臣加入派系的念头被打消

original: You have spent some time investigating one of your liege's vassals in [Root.Location.GetName], and you feel that you have gathered enough information to gain a leverage that would discourage the vassal from supporting conspiratorial factions in the future.
translation: 你在[Root.Location.GetName]花费了一些时间调查你的领主的一位封臣，你感到你已经收集了足够多的信息，它们可以用来打消这名封臣今后支持密谋反对你的领主的派系的念头。

original: My liege must be informed.
translation: 必须通知我的领主。

original: Your liege is informed.
translation: 你的领主接到通知。

original:
My liege,

I believe that one of your vassals can be discouraged from associating with conspiratorial factions if the proper leverage is obtained. How do you wish to proceed?

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，

如果能够获得适当的影响力的话，我相信可以打消你的一位封臣同密谋反对你的派系联合的念头。你想要怎么做呢？

你谦卑的间谍总管，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Blackmail the vassal.
translation: 敲诈这名封臣。

original: Obligate the vassal.
translation: 强迫这名封臣。

original: Threaten the vassal.
translation: 威胁这名封臣。

original: We will do nothing for now.
translation: 我们静观其变。

original: You use blackmail to gain a leverage on your vassal.
translation: 你通过敲诈来对你的一位封臣施加影响。

original: You use legalism to gain a leverage on your vassal.
translation: 你通过强迫来对你的一位封臣施加影响。

original: You use threats to gain a leverage on your vassal.
translation: 你通过威胁来对你的一位封臣施加影响。

original:
My dear [Root.GetTitle],

I regret that events have forced me to sully my hands in this manner, but unless you swear not to form new factions conspiring against me, I shall have to spread your unsavory secrets to anyone willing to listen.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的[Root.GetTitle]，

我很抱歉，因为我迫于形势而不得不用这种方式来弄脏我的双手，但是除非你发誓不会成立新的派系来反对我，否则我将会散播你那些不光彩的秘密给任何想听的人。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: My preferences in bed must not be revealed...
translation: 我对于床事的喜好不能被公之于众……

original: Others may not understand the wonders of impalement...
translation: 其他人也许不能理解刺刑的奇妙……

original: My desires might make others think less of me...
translation: 我的欲望也许会让别的人看低我……

original: If the full extent of my drinking problem became known...
translation: 如果关于我喝酒的全部事情都被人知道的话……

original: I have not exactly led the most pious life...
translation: 我没有在生活中做到完全的虔诚……

original: My little problem must not be revealed...
translation: 我的小问题不能被公之于众……

original: Perhaps it is best not to take a chance on this...
translation: 也许最好不要让这种事情有机会发生……

original: It's nothing but a bluff.
translation: 这只是虚张声势。

original: You refuse this outrageous demand.
translation: 你拒绝了这项过分的要求。

original: You decide it would be in your best interest to comply with this demand.
translation: 你决定完全地屈从于这项要求。

original:
Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Though I curse your name, I will comply with your unfair demand. Just... keep the sensitive information to yourself.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

虽然我想要咒骂你，但我还是会屈从于你那不公平的要求。只要你能够保证不泄露这些敏感的信息……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original:
My dear [Root.GetTitle],

Permit me to remind you of your obligations and duties as my sworn vassal. To form a conspiratorial faction would be in direct violation of these, and I must ask for your promise never to do so.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的[Root.GetTitle]，

请允许我提醒你作为我的封臣所宣誓承担的那些责任和义务。成立一个阴谋派系将会直接违背这些誓言，而且我必须得到你那以后绝不再犯的许诺。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: True. Scheming is not the honorable way of doing things.
translation: 好的。密谋不是一件荣誉的事情。

original: Yes, enough lies and scheming.
translation: 是的，太多谎言和密谋了。

original: Perhaps you are right, my liege.
translation: 也许你是正确的，我的领主。

original: Oh well. I wasn't planning on doing that anyway.
translation: 哦好的，总之我从来没有这样计划过。

original: True. Founding such a faction wouldn't be very nice of me.
translation: 是的，成立这样一个派系对我来说并不是一件好事。

original: Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] has a point...
translation: 也许[From.GetSheHe]说在点子上了……

original: Ha!
translation: 哈！

original:
Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Do not speak to me of obligations and duties! I may be your vassal, but that does not make me your slave. I am within my full right to associate with whichever faction I wish.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

不要跟我讲什么责任和义务！我也许是你的封臣，但这并不意味着我是你的奴隶。我完全有与任何我想联合的派系相联合的权利。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: That little...!
translation: 那个小贱人……！

original:
Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Thank you for reminding me of my duties and obligations as your vassal. You are right, of course. For the foreseeable future, you have my promise not to support factions conspiring against you.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

多谢您提醒我作为你的封臣应尽的责任和义务。当然，您是对的。在可预见的将来，我向您承诺绝不支持那些密谋反对您的派系。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Very good.
translation: 非常好。

original:
My dear [Root.GetTitle],

If you think I let any vassal of mine support factions conspiring against me without taking action, you are sorely mistaken. If you value your wretched life, you will swear not to form any such faction.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的[Root.GetTitle]，

如果你认为我会让我的封臣支持密谋反对我的派系而不采取任何行动，你就大错特错了。如果你还珍惜你可怜的生命，你就要发誓绝不成立任何这样的派系。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Oh my! I swear it! I swear it!!
translation: 哦大人！我发誓！我发誓！！

original: I know [From.GetSheHe] isn't bluffing...
translation: 我知道[From.GetSheHe]不是在虚张声势……

original: It's not worth dying for if there's no afterlife...
translation: 如果没有来世的话这样死掉就太不值得了……

original: There is no shame in backing down over this...
translation: 在这件事情上退缩不是什么耻辱……

original: Forming a faction is too much work anyway...
translation: 总之成立一个派系太费事了……

original: No point in risking my neck over this.
translation: 拿我的脑袋在这件事情上冒险太不智了。

original: Do your worst.
translation: 有本事你放马过来。

original:
Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

Your pitiful threats against myself and my loved ones have revealed your true nature once and for all. I shall never submit. Do your worst.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

你对我和我所爱的人的可怜又可笑的威胁已经彻底揭示了你的本性。我绝不会屈从于你的，放马过来吧！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: The insolence!
translation: 这个傲慢的家伙！

original:
Honoured [Root.GetTitle],

I ask your forgiveness if I have done something to offend. I obviously wouldn't dream of associating with any faction conspiring against you or your enlightened rule.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

如果我有所冒犯，那我请求您的原谅。我显然不会想要和任何派系勾结以密谋反对您或者您的开明统治。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You are forgiven.
translation: 你得到原谅了。

original: Pleased
translation: 感到满意

original: Discouraged from Factionalism
translation: 打消参与派系的念头

original: Coerced into Joining Faction
translation: 被迫加入派系

original: Your vassal promises not to associate with factions conspiring against you.
translation: 你的封臣许诺不会加入密谋反对你的派系。

original: You gain leverage that can be used to recruit this noble into a faction.
translation: 你得到可以让这名贵族加入一个派系的影响力。

original: Noble Encouraged to Join Your Faction
translation: 贵族被鼓励加入你的派系

original: You have spent some time in [Root.Location.GetName], and you feel that you have found a promising candidate for membership in potential factions supported by your liege. A small amount of persuation will be necessary, however.
translation: 你在[Root.Location.GetName]花了一些时间，你感觉你找到了一名有希望迫使其加入你的领主支持的派系的候选人。但是少量的劝说将是必要的。

original: I will inform my liege at once.
translation: 我会立刻通知我的领主。

original:
My liege,

I have discovered a promising candidate that could potentially be strong-armed into joining factions that you support. How do you wish to proceed?

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，

我已经发现了一名有希望迫使其加入你支持的派系的候选人。你想要怎么做呢？

你谦卑的间谍总管，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Blackmail the noble.
translation: 敲诈这名贵族。

original: Obligate the noble.
translation: 强迫这名贵族。

original: Threaten the noble.
translation: 威胁这名贵族。

original: No, let us not go down this path...
translation: 不，我们不要这么做……

original: You use blackmail to gain a leverage on the noble.
translation: 你通过敲诈来对这名贵族施加影响。

original: You use legalism to gain a leverage on the noble.
translation: 你通过强迫来对这名贵族施加影响。

original: You use threats to gain a leverage on the noble.
translation: 你通过威胁来对这名贵族施加影响。

original:
Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Though I curse your name, I will promise to support any faction of yours when called upon. Just... keep the sensitive information to yourself.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

虽然我想要咒骂你，但我还是会承诺在你要求的时候支持你的任何派系。只要你能够保证不泄露这些敏感的信息……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Your legalistic nonsense will not be enough to manipulate me into picking up your banner. I will not pledge unquestioning support to your schemes.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

你那尊重法律的无稽之谈不足以摆布我站在你那一边。我发誓我不会不加犹豫地支持你的阴谋。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Your pitiful threats have revealed your true nature once and for all. I shall never submit. Do your worst.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

你那可怜又可笑的威胁已经地彻底揭示了你的本性。我不会屈服于你的，放马过来吧！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Honored [Root.GetTitle],

I obviously stand together with you and your confederates. Before you do something hasty that we shall both regret, permit me to offer my pledge to support your faction when called upon.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，

很显然，我会和您以及您的同盟站在一起。在您做出任何会使我们双方都后悔的仓促决定之前，请允许我发誓，我会在您要求的时候支持您的任何派系。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Wise choice.
translation: 明智的决定。

original: Zvolenian
translation: 兹沃伦

original: Spisian
translation: 斯皮施

original: You have decided to join your personal guard in their daily training regimen at dawn. Things were a bit stiff at first, but when they realized you wouldn't have them beheaded for scoring hits on you with their wooden practise swords, they taught you many valuable lessons. Your martial skill has improved.
translation: 你决定参加你的个人卫兵们每天清晨的训练。起初你感到有些吃力，但是当他们意识到你不会因为在你身上留下他们的木剑的痕迹而砍掉他们的脑袋之后，他们开始教给你许多有用的课程。你的军事能力得到了提升。

original: Parry, Riposte!
translation: 格挡，回刺！

original: You have been studying the art of mounted combat under the tutelage of a skilled local horseman. The bruises you have incurred from falling off your horse will heal in time and they are a small price to pay for your increased horsemanship.
translation: 你在当地一位有经验的骑手教导下学习骑马战斗的技巧。你从马上摔下来造成的伤痕会得到及时的治疗，而且它们是为提升你的马术而付出的轻微代价。

original: Giddyup!
translation: 驾！

original: History is a subject that has always fascinated you, and you have spent the last few weeks studying the campaigns of Alexander the Great. There are many lessons to be learned from his conquests in the east.
translation: 历史是一门一直吸引你的学科，你已经花费了过去的数周时间学习亚历山大大帝的战役。从他对于东方的征服中可以学到许多知识。

original: Perhaps I, too, will march east some day.
translation: 也许有一天我也会向东方进军。

original: Bookkeeping is an unappreciated art, and you have taken it upon yourself to master it. You have gained a clearer picture of the realm's finances and your stewardship has improved as a result.
translation: 记账是一门不被欣赏的艺术，你已经通过自学掌握了它.你因此获得了对于王国财政的更清晰的印象，你的管理能力也因此得到了提升。

original: I could do this all day.
translation: 我可以一整天做这件事情。

original: An important part of ruling a realm is learning how to delegate. This is something you have finally realized, and your stewardship has improved as a direct consequence.
translation: 治理一个王国的一个重要部分是学会如何委任代理。你现在终于认识到了这点，你的管理能力也因此得到了提升。

original: Things run more smoothly now.
translation: 现在事情运行得更加平稳。

original: Managing the large staff of servants in your castle is in many ways like managing a small realm. There are many duties to be performed, and getting things to run smoothly is a true challenge. You have spent some time reorganizing your household, and your stewardship has improved.
translation: 管理你的城堡中的数量众多的仆人在许多方面与治理一个小的国家十分相似。有许多的职责需要承担，让事情平稳运行也是一项真正的挑战。你花费了一些时间来重新组织你的家务，你的管理能力因此得到了提升。

original: Remember, breakfast is served at eight.
translation: 记住，早餐于8点开始。

original: Much knowledge has been lost since the glory days of the Roman Empire, but some of their engineering knowledge has been preserved in dusty, old tomes for posterity. You have spent several days studying a few of these, and your learning has improved.
translation: 罗马帝国的全盛时期之后已经有许多知识被遗忘了，但是他们的一些工程知识被保存在充满灰尘的古老图书中留给子孙后代。你花费了若干天来学习这些知识重的一部分，你的学识得到了提升。

original: They were a clever bunch.
translation: 罗马人真是一群聪明的家伙。

original: Philosophy is not quite as popular these days as it was in classical antiquity, but you have found an old scholar who is willing to share his knowledge with you. Under his tutelage, you study the works of Plato, Socrates, Aristotle and other philosophical giants.
translation: 哲学现在并不如它在古典时代那么流行，但是你找到了一名愿意把他的知识分享给你的年老的学者。在他的教导之下，你学习了柏拉图，苏格拉底，亚里士多德以及其他哲学大师的著作。

original: I know that I know nothing.
translation: 我知道我一无所知。

original: The heavens can teach us much, and you have been engrossed in the science of astronomy for the past several days. You have learned the names of the celestial bodies and the various constellations, and how to use the stars for navigation. Your learning has improved.
translation: 天空可以教会我们很多，在过去的几天你已经迷上了天文学。你已经学习了各种天体和星座的名字，以及如何利用星星来指引方向。你的学识得到了提升。

original: So it's just a comet, not an omen of the end times...
translation: 所以这只是一颗彗星，不是末日来临的征兆……

original: There is a talented town crier in [Root.Location.GetName] who seems able to capture the attention of the peasant rabble in an instant with his commanding voice. You have studied his methods and the pitch of his voice closely, and you expect to do better the next time you have to address a large crowd of people.
translation: 在[Root.Location.GetName]有一个天才的宣讲员，他似乎可以用他有力的声音瞬间抓住乌合的农夫们的注意力。你仔细地学习了他讲话的方法和声音的音高，并且期待下次你在向一大群人讲话的时候能够做的更好。

original: Hear ye, hear ye!
translation: 你们当听，你们当听！

original: You have spent some time immersed in tomes describing the various cultures surrounding your realm. Though some of what you learned seems suspect, you have still obtained a better understanding in how to approach foreigners. Your diplomatic ability has improved as a result.
translation: 你花费了一些时间沉浸在描绘你的王国周围的各种文化的书籍之中。虽然一些你学到的东西看起来可疑，你仍然更进一步地了解了如何对待外国人。你的外交能力因此得到了提升。

original: Things would be simpler if everyone was [Root.Culture.GetName].
translation: 如果每个人都是[Root.Culture.GetName]人，事情就变得简单多了。

original: An old weather-bitten diplomat who has served in most of the courts in Europe ("the ones that mattered at least") agreed to take you under his wing for a few days. He has taught you many valuable tricks in how to deal with vassals and other rulers.
translation: 一个服务过欧洲众多宫廷的老练的政治家（「比较有影响力的宫廷」）已经同意教导你一段时间。他教会了你很多关于怎样同封臣以及其他统治者相处的有用的诀窍。

original: Much obliged.
translation: 获益匪浅。

original: You have been studying alchemy recently, for the sole purpose of learning everything you can about poisons. You have learned the answers to important questions such as which poisons are the most potent, which are the most difficult to detect and how best to guard against them.
translation: 最近你在研究炼金学，这仅仅是为了学习所有你能学会的关于毒药的知识。你学到了哪些毒药是最强力的，哪些是最难检测到的，以及怎样最好地防备它们。

original: This knowledge may save my life one day.
translation: 这些知识也许会拯救我的生命。

original: Assassins are a constant danger that every ruler may have to face. To prepare, you have decided to expand the size of your personal bodyguard. Any would-be [Root.GetTitle]-slayer will have to fight through them first!
translation: 刺客是每一个统治者都可能面临的危险。为了防备刺杀，你决定增加你的个人保镖的人数。所有潜在的[Root.GetTitle]杀手都必须先通过他们这一关！

original: They shall follow me everywhere.
translation: 他们应该每时每刻都跟着我。

original: You have hired an old assassin to teach you how best to thwart the efforts of his kind. He has taught you several valuable lessons, like never sitting with your back towards a door and to never stay long in an inn that smells of manure.
translation: 你雇佣了一名老刺客让他教你怎样最好地防备他这一类人。他教给你一些有用的知识，像永远不要在坐下的时候把你的后背朝向房门，以及永远不要在一家带有肥料味道的酒馆中停留过长。

original: These lessons will prolong my life.
translation: 这些知识可以延长我的寿命。

original: You have dispatched couriers to every corner of your realm, who will sing the praises of your dynasty and speak of its great deeds. Hopefully this will make it seem less decadent.
translation: 你把信使分派到王国的每一个角落，他们会到处歌颂赞扬你的家族并且讲述它的伟大事迹。希望这样可以让家族看起来不那么腐败堕落。

original: I should hope so!
translation: 我应当这么希望！

original: The decadence of your dynasty has become a problem, and in an effort to root it out you have decided to strip your palace of unnecessary luxuries. This should bring you closer to the people.
translation: 你的家族限于腐败堕落之中，为了根除这一问题，你决定把不必要的奢侈品从你的宫殿中移除。这会使你与人民更加亲近。

original: The wine fountain will be missed, though...
translation: 这座葡萄酒喷泉就别拆了……

original: You have ordered your men to close down all the brothels in [Root.Location.GetName]. No exceptions.
translation: 你命令你的部队关闭所有位于[Root.Location.GetName]的妓院。没有例外。

original: This decadence must end.
translation: 必须终结这种堕落。

original: In the chaos of battle, your men have managed to corner [From.GetTitledFirstName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] resisted bravely before they slew [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 一片混战之中，你的军队成功包围了[From.GetTitledFirstName]！在[From.GetHerHim]被杀死之前，[From.GetSheHeCap]进行了勇敢的抵抗。

original: Good riddance!
translation: 谢天谢地！

original: §Y$WHO$§!: $DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ Decadence from war contribution.\n
translation: §Y$WHO$§!：从战争贡献中$DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ 腐化度。\n

original: Child Born in the Purple
translation: 孩子生于紫室

original: A §Y$SEX$§! was Born in the Purple to §Y$CHAR1$§! and §Y$CHAR2$§!, named §Y$CHILD$§!.
translation: 一名§Y$SEX$§!生于紫室，双亲是§Y$CHAR1$§!和§Y$CHAR2$§!，起名为§Y$CHILD$§!。

original: $MOTHER$ has given birth to a $SEX$ in the Porphyry Chamber. The child will be named $CHILD$
translation: $MOTHER$已于紫色宫殿中生出一个$SEX$。这个孩子的名字将是$CHILD$

original: You have a $SEX$! $CHAR2$ suggests naming the child:
translation: 你有了一个$SEX$！$CHAR2$为这个孩子命名：

original: Less than §Y$VAL$§! Backers in Faction '§Y$FACTION$§!'
translation: 「§Y$FACTION$§!」派系的支持者少于 §Y$VAL$§!

original: At least §Y$VAL$§! Backers in Faction '§Y$FACTION$§!'
translation: 在「§Y$FACTION$§!」派系中至少有 §Y$VAL$§! 支持者

original: Ethnicity is NOT
translation: 种族特点不是

original: Ethnicity is
translation: 种族特点是

original: Commit Suicide
translation: 自杀

original: Your depression has gotten the better of you and you have decided to end it all.
translation: 你被抑郁打垮，你决定结束这一切。
